20050000.English_Text: I bet you've been on a lot of adventures, right?
20050000.Chinese_Text: 大侠在外面经历了很多冒险吧？

20050001.Original_Text: (모험이라고 할 정도로 대단한 건 없다고 한다)
20050001.English_Text: It wasn't much of an adventure.
20050001.Chinese_Text: （表示没什么可以称得上冒险的事情）

20050002.Original_Text: 어휴... 무슨 말씀을 하십니까. \n이미 <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>풍백문</> 제자들 사이에선 말이 다 돌았습니다.
20050002.English_Text:
You're being far too humble.
Rumors are already being spread among the apprentices of the <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Ivory Gale</>.
20050002.Chinese_Text:
唉...请不要谦虚。 
风白门弟子们都已经听说了大侠的事迹。

20050003.Original_Text: 세상의 온갖 기연을 겪으시고 \n수많은 위기 속에서 세상을 구하셨다고...
20050003.English_Text:
You've endured numerous Fates
and saved the world from various dangers.
20050003.Chinese_Text:
听说大家经历了世间各种奇缘， 
在无数危机中拯救了世界...

20050004.Chinese_Text: （表示传闻有些夸张或误传的部分）

20050005.English_Text:
Ah, such sincere humility...
I can't help but respect you.
20050005.Chinese_Text:
果然...还这么谦逊...
真是了不起，值得尊敬。

20050007.Original_Text: 저희 <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>풍백문</> 제자들은 어린 시절에 입문해서\n합숙 생활을 시작합니다.
20050007.English_Text:
The disciples of the <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Ivory Gale</> enter at a young age
and begin their communal life there.
20050007.Chinese_Text:
风白门的弟子们在幼时入门，
过着合宿生活。

20050008.Original_Text: 뭐 나름 다양한 경험을 쌓고자 하고 있지만\n그래도 여기를 크게 벗어나진 못하지요.
20050008.English_Text:
Although they do try broaden their experience,
the opportunities to do that here are pretty limited.
20050008.Chinese_Text:
虽然大家努力积累各种经验，
但大致都离不开这个地方。

20050009.Original_Text: 혹시 제자들을 만나서 선배로서!\n조언 같은 걸 좀 주실 수는 없을까요?
20050009.English_Text:
So, could you help the students out a little, as a teacher?
Won't you give them some advice?
20050009.Chinese_Text:
是否可以请你作为前辈！
与弟子们见面并传授一些经验与建议呢？

20050010.Original_Text: 아니... 이런 곳에 오시다니요.\n말씀 많이 들었습니다!
20050010.English_Text:
Ah, you've traveled a long way to get here.
I've heard a lot about you!
20050010.Chinese_Text:
什么...没想到大侠竟然会光临寒舍。
我对大侠可是久仰大名！

20050012.Original_Text: 아이고. 알다마다요. \n지금 <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>문주님</>과 생사고락을 함께하신 분 아니십니까?
20050012.English_Text:
I do know of you.
You're the one who's shared joys and sorrows with our <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Clan Leader</>, aren't you?
20050012.Chinese_Text:
哎哟，当然知道。
大侠不是与门主大人生死与共的关系吗？

20050013.Chinese_Text: （无法强烈否定，只能含糊其辞）

20050014.English_Text:
Do you have any advice
or instructions for us?
20050014.Chinese_Text:
是否想给我们建议，
或者训话呢？

20050015.Original_Text: (자신은 그렇게 대단한 사람이 아니라며 부정하고\n오히려 질문이 있어서 왔다고 한다)
20050015.English_Text:
I'm not wise enough to do that.
Actually, I've come here to ask a question.
20050015.Chinese_Text:
（表示自己不是那么了不起的人，
反而是来问事情的）

20050016.Original_Text: 말씀만 하십시오. \n제가 아는 내용이면 답변 드리겠습니다.
20050016.English_Text:
Please, go ahead and just ask.
I'll be happy to answer if I can.
20050016.Chinese_Text:
请说。
绝对知无不言。

20050017.English_Text: Do you know anything about the <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>Haewol Quarters</>?

20050018.Original_Text: 이곳이요? 과거 탐사대가 동쪽으로 이동하던 중에\n거대비옥을 발견하게 됩니다.
20050018.English_Text:
This place? An expedition in the past ventured to the east
and discovered a Giant Caelite.
20050018.Chinese_Text:
这里吗？探查队在过去行至东边的过程中
发现了巨型閟玉。

20050019.Original_Text: 조사해 봤더니 그 비옥이 \n<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>풍백문</>이 모시는 <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>신수</>와 관계가 있었던 겁니다!
20050019.English_Text:
We discovered that the Caelite
was, in fact, related to the <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Advocate</> that <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Ivory Gale</> served!
20050019.Chinese_Text:
调查之后发现，
那个閟玉与风白门信奉的神兽有关！

20050020.Original_Text: 그래서 비옥을 기념도 하고, 보존도 하려고\n여기에 <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>해월지부</>를 짓게 된 것이지요.
20050020.English_Text:
So, we set up this <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>Haewol Branch</>
to commemorate and preserve that Caelite.
20050020.Chinese_Text:
因此为了纪念并保存閟玉，
在这里建立了海越支部。

20050021.English_Text: There are fewer people here than I expected.

20050022.Original_Text: 지금은 4차 교육과정 시간표에 따라 \n실전 훈련 및 주변 환경 정리하는 시간입니다.
20050022.English_Text:
Currently, it's time for training and cleaning,
according to the 4th curriculum timetable.
20050022.Chinese_Text:
根据4次教育课程时间表，
目前正在进行实战训练及清理周边环境。

20050023.Original_Text: 아... 그러니까 <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>지부</> 근처에 있는 \n실질적인 적대세력을 정리하고
20050023.English_Text:
Ah, yes... So, this training is for the purpose of
eliminating enemies near this <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>branch</>.
20050023.Chinese_Text:
啊...也就是说，我们正在消灭
支部附近的实质性敌对势力，

20050024.Original_Text: 실전 경험을 쌓는 훈련이라고 보시면 되겠습니다.
20050024.English_Text: and to obtain some practical experience.

20050025.English_Text: The curriculum and timetable look great. Wow.
20050025.Chinese_Text: （对教育课程及时间表表示感叹）

20050026.Original_Text: <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>풍백문</>은 역사가 깊은 문파니까요.\n우수한 교육과정이 좋은 인재를 모으는 비결이지요.
20050026.English_Text:
<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Ivory Gale</> has a long history.
Our excellent curriculum is why we attract so many people with talent.
20050026.Chinese_Text:
风白门是历史悠久的门派。
优秀的教育课程是吸引优秀人才的秘诀。

20050027.Original_Text: (혹시 훈련하는 모습을 볼 수 있냐고 묻는다)

20050028.English_Text:
Certainly. Then, would you follow me?
I'll guide you there.
20050028.Chinese_Text:
大侠愿意跟我一起去吗？
请让我来带路。

20050029.Original_Text: 이미 훈련생들이 많이 돌아갔군요.\n저희가 좀 늦은 것 같습니다.
20050029.English_Text:
Most of the apprentices have already returned.
We're a little late.
20050029.Chinese_Text:
大部分门徒都已经回去了。
看来我们来晚了一步。

20050030.English_Text:
This is enough since there
are still some people left.
20050030.Chinese_Text:
（表示还有剩下的人，
这样就已经足够）

20050031.Original_Text: 그렇게 말씀해주시니 다행입니다.\n이렇게 보고만 있는 것도 지루하실 텐데
20050031.English_Text:
Thank you for your consideration.
But it'll be boring if you simply stand around and watch.
20050031.Chinese_Text:
多谢大侠的体谅。
只是看着的话应该很无聊吧。

20050032.English_Text: Could you help us drive out the <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Oduksinis</>?
20050032.Chinese_Text: 是否可以请大侠帮忙赶走血猪族呢？

20050033.Original_Text: (별로 지루하진 않다고 답하려다 그냥 고개를 끄덕인다)
20050033.English_Text: (I was going to say I wasn't bored, but I should just nod now.)
20050033.Chinese_Text: （本来想回答说不无聊，但还是决定点头）

20050034.English_Text: We don't want to fight the <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Oduksini</>, either.
20050034.Chinese_Text: 我们其实也不想与血猪族为敌...

20050035.Original_Text: 점점 세력을 확대하고 있어 바깥으로 몰아내려고 합니다.
20050035.English_Text: But they're expanding their forces, so we have to drive them away.
20050035.Chinese_Text: 但血猪族不断扩张着势力，企图逼走我们。

20050036.Original_Text: 그... 이런 질문을 드려도 되는 건지...
20050036.English_Text: Erm... Actually, I don't know if I'm allowed to ask you this...
20050036.Chinese_Text: 那个...不知道可不可以问一个问题...

20050038.Original_Text: <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>문주</>님과는 어떤 관계시죠?\n제자들 사이에서 온갖 추측이 난무하고 있어서요.
20050038.English_Text:
What is your relationship with our <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Clan Leader</>?
There's been all kinds of talk among the apprentices.
20050038.Chinese_Text:
不知大侠与门主大人是什么关系？
弟子们之间各种猜测不断。

20050040.Original_Text: 아뇨. 이게... 그 뭐랄까요. 별거 아닙니다.\n그냥 사람들이 잘 모르고 궁금해서 하는 소리죠.
20050040.English_Text:
Well... It's slightly... I guess it's not really important.
They're probably saying that because they don't know any better.
20050040.Chinese_Text:
不。这个...该怎么说呢，其实也没什么。
这只是好奇的人们随便乱说而已。

20050041.Original_Text: (그냥 같은 스승 아래에서 배운 동문이라고 한다)
20050041.English_Text: We're simply colleagues who studied under the same teacher.
20050041.Chinese_Text: （说只是拜在同一个师父门下的同门而已）

20050042.Original_Text: 그렇죠? 하긴 <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>문주</>님이 다른 스승이 있다는 이야기는 들었습니다.
20050042.English_Text: I thought so. I did hear that our <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Clan Leader</> had another teacher.
20050042.Chinese_Text: 是吗？我倒也听说过门主大人拜过其他师父。

20050043.Original_Text: <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>아랑</>님은 기존의 <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>풍백문</> 규칙을 깨면서 문주가 되셨는데... \n다른 스승을 두는 것까지도 참 파격적입니다.
20050043.English_Text:
Clan Leader <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Aran</> became our Leader by breaking the rules of <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Ivory Gale</>... 
It's a bit hard to believe that he had a teacher of his own.
20050043.Chinese_Text:
饿狼大人打破风白门旧规成为了门主...
拜多个师父也很破格。

20050044.English_Text: What rule did he break to become the Clan Leader?
20050044.Chinese_Text: （问成为门主时打破了什么旧规）

20050045.Original_Text: 지금까지는 <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>이전 문주</>님의 자녀가 이어받는 게 규칙이었습니다.\n그래서 다들 <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>송시국</>님이 문주가 될 거로 생각했었죠.
20050045.English_Text:
The rule was that only a child of the <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>former Clan Leader</> could inherit the role of Leader.
So, everyone thought that <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Song Sigook</> would become the next Leader.
20050045.Chinese_Text:
过去一直都是前任门主的子女继承门主之位。
所以大家都以为宋时局大人会成为新的门主。

20050046.Original_Text: 근데 갑자기 <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>아랑</>님이 문주가 되신다고 해서\n다들 당황했던 기억이 나네요.
20050046.English_Text:
I remember how startled they all were
after the announcement that <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Aran</> was to become the Clan Leader.
20050046.Chinese_Text:
当饿狼大人突然成为门主时，
大家都很吃惊。

20050047.Original_Text: 아휴. 이 말은 무시해 주십시오. \n<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>풍백문</> 바깥에 할 이야기는 아니었던 것 같습니다.
20050047.English_Text:
Please forget about that last thing I said.
I really shouldn't be telling that to anyone outside <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Ivory Gale</>.
20050047.Chinese_Text:
唉，请当做没听到这句话吧。
这种事不应该传到风白门外面。

20050049.English_Text: (Perhaps he's here to cause trouble at <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Ivory Gale</>?)

20050050.English_Text: Come at me! I'll take on the world!
20050050.Chinese_Text: 放马过来吧！全世界的人们！

20050052.Original_Text: 제가 최근 들어 실력이 일취월장한 것 같습니다.\n약간 괄목상대할 수준?
20050052.English_Text:
My skills seem to have gotten better recently.
I'm actually pretty surprised.
20050052.Chinese_Text:
我的实力最近突飞猛进。
应该说令人刮目相看？

20050053.Original_Text: 동급에선 상대할 자가 없달까요?\n어이~ 너무 건방진 거 아냐? 하하!
20050053.English_Text:
At this point, my own peers might not even be enough of a challenge.
Hey, aren't you getting too cocky? Haha!
20050053.Chinese_Text:
在同级别的人当中可以说无人能敌！
哎呀~我是不是过于狂妄了？哈哈！

20050055.Original_Text: 저 같은 자가 세상 사람들의 고통을 등한시한다는 건\n운명을 거스르는 거겠죠?
20050055.English_Text:
It would mean defying fate if a person such as I
ignored the troubles and pain of the people, wouldn't it?
20050055.Chinese_Text:
像我这样的人若对世人的痛苦视而不见，
应该可以算忤逆命运吧？

20050056.English_Text: It's good to help other people.

20050057.Original_Text: 그런 의미에서 <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>풍백문</>은 문제가 있다고 봅니다.\n<textColor=[110:216:175:255]>비옥대지</>에 <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>박쥐</>가 나타나서 민생이 흔들리고 있는데...
20050057.English_Text:
In that sense, I believe there's a problem with <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Ivory Gale</>.
The people are suffering from the <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>bats</> appearing in the <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>Caelite Lands</>.
20050057.Chinese_Text:
因此可以说风白门有一个问题。
出现在北方的蝙蝠正在扰乱民生...

20050058.Original_Text: 지금 뭐 하고 있는지 모르겠다는... \n당장 널 잡으러 간다. <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>검은 날개의 재앙</>!
20050058.English_Text:
I don't know what we're doing...
I'll get you, you <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>black winged monsters</>!
20050058.Chinese_Text:
却不知道风白门对此做了什么...
我这就去讨伐那些黑翼的灾难！

20050059.Original_Text: <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>비옥대지</>는 <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>풍백문</>이 관리하고 있다고 봐야 하는데...\n<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>박쥐</>를 이렇게 방치하니 <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>풍백문</>이 겁쟁이란 말을 듣는 거라는...
20050059.English_Text:
Everybody knows that the <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>Caelite Land</> is managed by <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Ivory Gale</>...
If they just leave the <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>bats</> alone, they'll be seen as dishonorable cowards.
20050059.Chinese_Text:
应该说东部森林归风白门所管...
可他们却对蝙蝠视若无睹，所以人们才会说风白门胆小怕事...

20050060.Original_Text: (그래도 다른 사람들과 함께 하는 게 좋겠다고 조언한다)
20050060.English_Text: My advise is that it's still best to work with others.
20050060.Chinese_Text: （建议说最好还是跟其他人一起做）

20050061.Original_Text: 이미 말해봤죠. <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>박쥐</>가 사람을 물어가고 먹이로 하고 있다!\n<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>풍백문</>이 처리해야 하는 거 아니냐!
20050061.English_Text:
I already tried to persuade them. The <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>bats</> are eating people as food!
The <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Ivory Gale</> should do something about this!
20050061.Chinese_Text:
我已经找过其他人。我说蝙蝠正在吃人！
风白门应该出手消灭蝙蝠！

20050062.Original_Text: 근데 문주님은 보이지도 않고, \n대장로님은 하지 마라. 하면 안 된다고 부정적인 말씀만 하시고요.
20050062.English_Text:
But the Clan Leader is nowhere to be found,
and the Great Elder keeps trying to talk me out of it.
20050062.Chinese_Text:
可是门主大人不见踪影，
大长老也说不要去管，不能去做，只说些消极的话。

20050063.Original_Text: (아마 이유가 있을 거라며 위험한 일을 하면 안 된다고 한다)
20050063.English_Text: There must be a reason. The danger may be too great for now.
20050063.Chinese_Text: （说应该有什么理由，劝他不要去做危险的事）

20050064.Original_Text: 제가 무슨 천둥벌거숭이도 아니고... \n그 정도도 구분 못 하는 바보는 아니랄까요?
20050064.English_Text:
I'm not a child anymore.
And I'm certainly not stupid enough to be unable to tell the difference.
20050064.Chinese_Text:
我又不是三岁小孩...
你以为我连这点是非都分不清吗？

20050065.English_Text: Hey, what are you talking about? Ahem! Haha!
20050065.Chinese_Text: 哎哟~你说什么呀！咳咳！哈哈！

20050067.Original_Text: 어휴휴. 사소한 건 넘어가시면 됩니다. 자! 저도 그 거대한 박쥐,\n<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>백야금</>을 상대하긴 어렵다는 거 잘 압니다!
20050067.English_Text:
It's all trivial matters that don't need your attention. Now I know that giant bat, the
<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>White Night Gargoyle</>, is a tough opponent!
20050067.Chinese_Text:
呵呵呵，请不要计较这种小事。
好！我也知道白夜禽很难对付！

20050068.Original_Text: 하지만 일반 박쥐 수준인 <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>야금</> 정도는 \n충분히 상대할 수 있달까요?
20050068.English_Text: But I can still handle a <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Night Gargoyle</>, which is the size of a normal bat.
20050068.Chinese_Text: 但是我的实力应该足够对付夜禽吧？

20050069.English_Text:
It's not even a <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>White Night Gargoyle</>?
How could a common <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Night Gargoyle</> be so strong? Urgh...
20050069.Chinese_Text:
别说白夜禽...
没想到连普通夜禽都那么厉害...唉...

20050070.Original_Text: (아직 좀 더 수련이 필요할 것 같다고 한다)
20050070.English_Text: It seems you need more training.

20050071.Original_Text: 제가 엄청나게 강해졌다고 생각했는데 아직 멀었던 거네요.\n대장로님은 이미 알고 계셨던 거겠죠?
20050071.English_Text:
I thought I had gotten considerably stronger, but it seems I was wrong.
The Great Elder knew about this, didn't he?
20050071.Chinese_Text:
我还以为自己已经很强了，没想到还差这么远。
大长老早就知道会变成这样吧？

20050072.English_Text:
I don't know myself,
but it's possible he might've known.
20050072.Chinese_Text:
（表示自己也不确定，
不过多半如此）

20050073.Original_Text: 옆에서 지켜봤는데... 정말 대단하시네요.\n엄청난 격차를 느꼈습니다.
20050073.English_Text:
I was watching you, and you're amazing.
I could feel the gap in ability between us.
20050073.Chinese_Text:
我在旁边看到后才明白...大侠真了不起。
我们的实力真是天差地远。

20050074.English_Text: I should return to <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Ivory Gale</> and focus on my training.
20050074.Chinese_Text: 我要回到风白门重新埋头苦练。

20050075.English_Text:
It's the right decision to make.
I wish you a safe trip back.
20050075.Chinese_Text:
（表示赞同，
让他小心回去）

20050076.Original_Text: 잠시만요. 여기에 <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>야금</>도 많고,\n저 같은 사람이 혼자 움직이면 위험할 것도 같고...
20050076.English_Text:
Wait. There are a lot of <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Night Gargoyles</>.
They're too dangerous for someone like me to handle alone...
20050076.Chinese_Text:
请等一下。这里有很多夜禽，
像我这样的人单独行动会很危险...

20050077.Original_Text: 괜히 <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>야금</>을 자극하는 것은 여기에 사는 사람들이나\n<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>풍백문</>에게까지 폐가 될 수도 있을 것 같고...
20050077.English_Text:
Provoking the <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Night Gargoyles</> would bring trouble to the people here
and to <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Ivory Gale</>...
20050077.Chinese_Text:
刺激夜禽只会给生活在这里的居民
以及风白门造成困扰...

20050079.Original_Text: 혹시 <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>날개 사냥 집결지</>까지만 같이 가주시면 안 되나요?
20050079.English_Text: Could you accompany me up to the <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>Winged Monster Hunting Zone</>?
20050079.Chinese_Text: 可以跟我一起回到猎羽集结地吗？

20050080.English_Text: Oh! Now, there's a familiar face.

20050082.Original_Text: 지금 <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>백야금</>, <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>대야금</>때문에 지역의 주민들이 피해를 보고 있는데...
20050082.English_Text: The residents in the region are suffering because of the <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>White Night Gargoyle</> and <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Giant Night Gargoyle</>...
20050082.Chinese_Text: 现在白夜禽，大夜禽使这里的居民蒙受不少损失...

20050083.Original_Text: 해수 사냥의 전문가, 해수처리왕 <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>지미갓</>이 빠질 순 없지.
20050083.English_Text: I, <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Jimmy Ace</>, the expert in Hesuth Hunting, can't miss an opportunity like this.
20050083.Chinese_Text: 轮到我狩猎海兽专家，海兽处理王吉米神大展身手了。

20050084.Original_Text: 뭐 이걸 처리하고 나면 받기로 한 것도 있고 말이지...
20050084.English_Text: Technically, there's also something in it for me after I deal with this...
20050084.Chinese_Text: 反正处理这件事之后还有报酬可以拿...

20050085.English_Text: What are you muttering at the end?

20050086.Original_Text: 아니야. 지역 주민들의 괴로움을 나눠 받겠다는 이야기였어.
20050086.English_Text: Nothing. I was just saying that the suffering of the people is my own suffering, too.
20050086.Chinese_Text: 没什么。我只是说想和这里的居民共患难。

20050087.Original_Text: 역시! 대장! 주민들을 생각하는 마음이 크으!
20050087.English_Text: I knew it! Captain, you really do care about the people!
20050087.Chinese_Text: 真不愧是！队长！时刻都为居民们着想！

20050088.Original_Text: 너 복받은 줄 알아! 이런 중요한 일을 하게 되다니...
20050088.English_Text: You should know that you're lucky to be tasked with something so important...
20050088.Chinese_Text: 你要明白自己多有福气！竟然能负责这么重要的事...

20050089.Original_Text: <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>백야금</>은 좀 힘들겠고... <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>대야금</>를 처치하여\n이 지역의 주민들을 도울 준비는 되었나?
20050089.English_Text:
The <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>White Night Gargoyle</> is a little too much... Are you ready
to help the residents by eliminating the <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Giant Night Gargoyle</>?
20050089.Chinese_Text:
白夜禽有点困难...有没有做好
消灭大夜禽以帮助居民们的准备？

20050090.Original_Text: 지금 마침 <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>대야금</>만 있군. 딱 좋을 때 왔군.
20050090.English_Text: This is a good chance. The <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Giant Night Gargoyle</> is on its own.
20050090.Chinese_Text: 正好不见白夜禽，只有大夜禽。来得正好。

20050092.Original_Text: 역시 내 안목이 옳았군. \n공은 네가 모두 가져도 좋아!
20050092.English_Text:
Looks like I was right all along.
However, you can take all the credit!
20050092.Chinese_Text:
果然我没看走眼。
功劳就都归你了！

20050093.Original_Text: 난 그런 명예보다는 역시 보상 쪽이...
20050093.English_Text: I prefer actual rewards more than credit...
20050093.Chinese_Text: 我不需要名誉，只要有报酬...

20050095.Original_Text: 아니아니... 내가 나에게 주는 마음의 보상 같은 거랄까?
20050095.English_Text: Well, I suppose you can think of it as a reward from the heart.
20050095.Chinese_Text: 不，不...我说的是给自己心灵上的报酬。

20050096.Original_Text: 야! 너! 좋은 기회를 받았으면 감사히 생각해야지.
20050096.English_Text: Hey! You! You should be grateful to get an opportunity as good as this.
20050096.Chinese_Text: 喂！你！得到这么好的机会就应该感恩戴德。

20050097.English_Text: That's right! Why are you even asking that?

20050098.Chinese_Text: （表示知道了，让他们少说两句）

20050099.Original_Text: 언젠가 또 볼 것 같은 느낌이 드는군.\n그때 다시 인사하자고.
20050099.English_Text:
I have a feeling that we'll meet again.
I'll be looking forward to when that happens.
20050099.Chinese_Text:
我感觉我们总有一天还会相见。
到时候再叙旧吧。

20050100.English_Text:
Oh! Look who's here!
Isn't it the honorary <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Baron Pioneer</> <textColor=[255:204:102:255]><myHero.name/></>, meow?
20050100.Chinese_Text:
哟！这是谁喵！
不是名誉开拓巴隆团<myHero.name/>吗喵？

20050101.English_Text: (I'm so happy to see <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Naypaw</> and the other <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Barons</>.)
20050101.Chinese_Text: （看到聂喵和其他巴隆，高兴地打招呼）

20050102.Original_Text: 혹시 우리 이름을 잊어버리고 \n<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>단장님</>과 다른 바롱이라고 생각한 거 아니냥?
20050102.English_Text:
Did you fur-get our names
and mistake the <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>leader</> for another Baron, meow?
20050102.Chinese_Text:
你是不是忘记我们的名字，
心想遇到了聂喵和其他巴隆喵？

20050103.Original_Text: 틀림없다냥. 그게 아니었으면 우리 이름도 불렀을 거다냥!
20050103.English_Text: No doubt about it. If that wasn't the case, you would've called us by name, meow!
20050103.Chinese_Text: 没错喵。否则肯定也叫了我们的名字喵。

20050104.English_Text: Come on! Of course I know your names.
20050104.Chinese_Text: （说出每个巴隆的名字，再次打招呼）

20050105.English_Text: Hmph! So, fishing fur compliments, mrrow?

20050106.Original_Text: 뿡! 맞다냥! 그게 아니었으면 우리 이름도 안 불렀을 거다냥!
20050106.English_Text: Rawr! That's right! If that wasn't the case, you would've called our names, too, mow!
20050106.Chinese_Text: 崩！没错喵！如果不是我们说出来，他肯定不会说我们的名字喵！

20050107.Original_Text: 자! 아무리 반가워도 인사는 이 정도만 해두는 거다냥!\n명예 <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>바롱단원</>이 해야 할 일이 있다냥!
20050107.English_Text:
Now! Enough with the pleasantries!
We have a job for our honorary <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Baron member</>!
20050107.Chinese_Text:
好啦！虽然久别重逢大家都很高兴，但招呼就打到这里吧喵！
名誉巴隆团团员有事要做喵！

20050108.English_Text: First, go to <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>Specter Hill</> and chase away the <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Daybreak</>!
20050108.Chinese_Text: 先去怨灵山丘赶走黑暗黎明团喵！

20050109.Original_Text: 최근에 주점에서 놀이로 크게 이겨 지도를 한 장 얻었다냥.
20050109.English_Text: Recently, I won a big game at a pub and received a map, meow.
20050109.Chinese_Text: 我最近在酒店赌赢了一张地图。

20050110.Original_Text: 지도에 의하면 <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>언덕</> 남쪽에 <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>숨겨진 동굴</>이 있어야 한다냥.\n그래서 일단 근처까지 와서 야영지까진 차렸다냥.
20050110.English_Text:
According to the map, there's a <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>hidden cave</> at the vewy south of the <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>hill</>, meow.
So, we've set up a camp near the area.
20050110.Chinese_Text:
根据地图显示，山丘南边应该有一处隐藏洞窟喵。
所以我们来附近建立了营地。

20050111.Original_Text: (지도를 보니 찾기 어렵진 않을 것 같다고 한다)
20050111.English_Text: From looking at the map, it's not too hard to find.
20050111.Chinese_Text: （看到地图后表示应该不难找到）

20050112.Original_Text: 물론 그렇다냥. 그러나 주변에 <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>검은새벽단</>이 몰려들어 접근할 수가 없다냥.
20050112.English_Text: Of course, purr. But the <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Daybreak</> in the region are keeping us from approaching it.
20050112.Chinese_Text: 当然喵。但是周围有黑暗黎明团，无法接近洞窟喵。

20050113.English_Text: The <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>leader</> gave up the camp and ran away first, hiss!
20050113.Chinese_Text: 聂喵抛弃营地最先逃走了喵！

20050114.Original_Text: 맞다냥! 우리는 쳐다보지도 않고 혼자 달려갔다냥!
20050114.English_Text: That's right! He ran away without even looking back at us, hiss!
20050114.Chinese_Text: 没错喵！看都没看我们一眼就独自逃走了喵！

20050115.English_Text:
Hmm hmm! <myHero.name/>.
Would you help us again, mrrow?
20050115.Chinese_Text:
哼哼！<myHero.name/>，
这次也能帮我们吗喵？

20050116.Chinese_Text: （说已经把附近的黑暗黎明团赶走了）

20050117.Original_Text: 겁이 나서 그러는 게 아니다냥! \n단지 <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>동굴</>을 찾기 어려워서 그러는 거다냥!
20050117.English_Text:
It's not because we're scared, mrrow!
It's just because we can't find the <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>cave</>!
20050117.Chinese_Text:
我不是因为害怕喵！
我只是觉得找洞窟很难而已喵！

20050118.English_Text: I've achieved yet another heroic feat!
20050118.Chinese_Text: 我又成就了一个伟业喵！

20050119.Original_Text: 흥! 우리라고 빨리 정정하는 게 좋을 거다냥!
20050119.English_Text: Hmph! You'd better fix it quickly, hiss!
20050119.Chinese_Text: 哼！我劝你最好赶紧说是我们喵！

20050120.Original_Text: 뿡! 맞다냥! \n항상 공은 혼자 차지하려 한다냥!
20050120.English_Text:
Grr! That's right! 
He's trying to take all the credit for himself, hiss!
20050120.Chinese_Text:
崩！没错喵！
聂喵总想独占功劳喵！

20050121.English_Text: We've achieved another heroic feat, meow!
20050121.Chinese_Text: 我们！又成就了一个伟业喵！

20050122.Original_Text: <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>검은새벽단</>의 거센 방해가 있었지만...\n이렇게 큰일을 해내다니... 자부심을 느낀다냥!
20050122.English_Text:
The <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Daybreak</> resisted fiercely, but...
We've achieved something great. I feel proud, purrr!
20050122.Chinese_Text:
虽然黑暗黎明团极力妨碍...
但我们仍然做出了大事...真是感到自豪喵！

20050124.English_Text:
<myHero.name/>,
you did well as an honorary <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Baron Pioneer</> too, meow!
20050124.Chinese_Text:
<myHero.name/>，
你作为名誉开拓巴隆团也做得很好喵！

20050125.English_Text: Thank you. Take care of yourself.
20050125.Chinese_Text: （表示知道了，让他们以后也多小心）

20050126.English_Text: I saw you at the <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>Caelite Ruins</> before.

20050127.English_Text: That's right. I was with him.

20050129.Original_Text: 아... 제가 그분의 마음을 전부 아는 것은 아니지만...\n짐작 가는 바가 있어서 거기까지만 말씀을 드리겠습니다.
20050129.English_Text:
Ah... I don't know that much about him.
I do have a good guess, though, so I can tell you that much.
20050129.Chinese_Text:
啊...我虽然并不了解少爷的内心想法...
但我可以把自己猜到一些事情告诉你。

20050130.Original_Text: 근데 주변에 혹시 소리가 들릴까 봐\n여기서 말씀드리기는 좀 그렇네요.
20050130.English_Text:
But I'm worried word might get out,
and this certainly isn't the best place.
20050130.Chinese_Text:
不过我怕隔墙有耳，
不方便在这里说。

20050131.English_Text: Perhaps we could go somewhere else?

20050132.Original_Text: 과거 <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>송시국</> 도련님께선 문주의 장자로 다들\n차기 문주가 될 것이라고 이야기했었습니다.
20050132.English_Text:
Everybody believed that as the eldest son of the Clan Leader,
<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Song Sigook</> would become the next Leader.
20050132.Chinese_Text:
宋时局少爷是前任门主的长子，
大家在过去都认为少爷将会是下任门主。

20050133.Original_Text: <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>아랑</>님과 <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>비류하</>님이 어린 나이에 두각을 드러냈지만,\n그걸 가지고 문주가 될 거로 생각하는 사람은 없었습니다.
20050133.English_Text:
<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Aran</> and <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Bi Ruha</> both showed great potential at a young age,
but nobody thought they'd have a chance of becoming the next Clan Leader.
20050133.Chinese_Text:
虽然饿狼大人和沸流河从小就崭露头角，
但没有人认为他们凭此就能成为门主。

20050134.Original_Text: <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>풍백문</> 전통적으로 결격사유만 없으면 문주의 자녀가\n차기 문주가 되는 거였으니까요.
20050134.English_Text:
In <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Ivory Gale</>, the child of the Clan Leader traditionally becomes the next Leader,
so long as they don't have any fatal flaws.
20050134.Chinese_Text:
因为根据风白门的传统，只要门主的子女没有太大的问题，
一般都会继承门主之位。

20050135.Original_Text: <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>송시국</> 도련님이 뭐 엄청나게 빼어난 능력을 갖춘 분은 아닐지도\n모릅니다. 하지만 또 그렇게 부족한 분도 아니셨죠.
20050135.English_Text:
Young master <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Song Sigook</> might not have had the best skills.
However, he also wasn't lacking.
20050135.Chinese_Text:
宋时局少爷的能力可能并没有那么出色。
但也并不是能力不足。

20050136.Original_Text: 그러다 <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>송문악</> 대장로께서 <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>아랑</>님을 문주로 지정하셨는데...\n그때부터가 아니었을까요? 뭔가 어긋나기 시작했던 시점이...
20050136.English_Text:
Then, the Great Elder <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Song Moonak</> designated <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Aran</> as the Clan Leader.
It was that moment, I think, when everything started to go sideways...
20050136.Chinese_Text:
后来宋文乐大长老把饿狼大人指定为门主...
应该就是那个时候吧？开始出现裂痕的瞬间...

20050137.English_Text: Why did <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Aran</> become the Clan Leader?

20050138.Original_Text: 저도 거기까진 모릅니다. 지금 와서 보면\n높은 능력을 어릴 때 꿰뚫어 보신 거겠죠.
20050138.English_Text:
I don't know the reason. Come to think of it,
it might be because they saw his extraordinary skills when he was young.
20050138.Chinese_Text:
我也不清楚。现在回想
应该是看中了小时候展露的惊人天赋。

20050139.Original_Text: 자신의 자식보다 <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>아랑</>님이 문주를 맡는 게 \n<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>풍백문</>을 위한 거로 생각해 결단을 내리신 게 아닐까요?
20050139.English_Text:
Perhaps he thought it would be best for <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Ivory Gale</>
if <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Aran</>, rather than his child, became the Clan Leader?
20050139.Chinese_Text:
前任门主认为饿狼大人比自己的孩子更适合担任门主，
所以为了风白门的未来做出了决断吧？

20050140.English_Text: Thank you for sharing your story.

20050142.Original_Text: 제가 이곳에 와서 다양하게 연구를 하고 있는데 말이에요.
20050142.English_Text: I've come here to conduct all different kinds of research.
20050142.Chinese_Text: 我来到这里进行着各种研究。

20050143.English_Text: Recently, I found a <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>jellyfish</> when I went into the <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>Dreamy Forest</>.
20050143.Chinese_Text: 最近在梦境森林里发现了水母。

20050144.Original_Text: (<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>해파리</>야 전 세계 어디든 있는 거 아니냐고 묻는다)
20050144.English_Text: What's so special about a <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>jellyfish</>? They can be found anywhere in the world.
20050144.Chinese_Text: （问水母不是存在于世界各地吗）

20050145.Original_Text: 그렇죠. 다양한 <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>해파리</>가 전 세계 바다에 살고 있습니다만...\n보통 숲에 살진 않잖아요.
20050145.English_Text:
That's right. <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>jellyfish</> can be found anywhere in the sea all over the world...
But they're usually not found in forests.
20050145.Chinese_Text:
是呀。各种水母栖息在全世界的海洋中...
但是一般不会出现在森林里。

20050146.English_Text: Why would a <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>jellyfish</> live in the forest?

20050147.Original_Text: 오! 저와 비슷한 의문을 품으셨군요.\n맞아요. <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>해파리</>에 왜 숲에 사는지 궁금해서요.
20050147.English_Text:
Ah, you're curious, too, just like me.
That's what I'm trying to figure out. What are those <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>jellyfish</> doing out of the water?
20050147.Chinese_Text:
啊！你和我的疑问很相似。
没错。我也很好奇水母为什么会出现在森林里。

20050148.Original_Text: 궁금한 거 풀어야 직성이 풀리는데...\n혹시 같이 가지 않으실래요?
20050148.English_Text:
I can't stand it when questions are left unanswered...
So, would you like to join me in finding out?
20050148.Chinese_Text:
我很想知道为什么...
要不要和我一起去看看呢？

20050150.English_Text: What kind of help do you need?

20050151.Original_Text: 저기 <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>해파리</>를 좀 넉넉히 잡아주시면 감사하겠습니다.\n실험할 수 있을 만큼 충분히 많이요.
20050151.English_Text:
It'd be helpful if you could catch plenty of <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>jellyfish</> over there.
There's a lot of tests and experiments to do, so I'll need a lot of them.
20050151.Chinese_Text:
希望你帮我抓到足够多的水母。
这里的水母数量足够我进行实验。

20050152.English_Text:
Maybe they could be eaten?
I do hope they're edible...
20050152.Chinese_Text:
不知道能不能食用？
如果能食用就再好不过了...

20050153.Original_Text: 좋아요. 좋습니다. <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>해파리</>는 보통 물에서 살아야 하는데...
20050153.English_Text: Good, good. Usually, <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>jellyfish</> have to live in water...
20050153.Chinese_Text: 好，很好。水母一般生活在水中...

20050154.Original_Text: (여긴 바다 안도 아니고, 바닷가도 아니라고 한다)
20050154.English_Text: This is not the ocean. There are no bodies of water near here.
20050154.Chinese_Text: （说这里既不是大海深处，也不是海边）

20050155.Original_Text: 과거에 어떤 이유로 이 지역의 땅이 솟아올랐을 수도 있어요.\n그전엔 여기가 바다였을 지도 모르죠.
20050155.English_Text:
The land here could have risen for some reason in the past.
Before that happened, maybe this place was a body of water.
20050155.Chinese_Text:
这片土地也许是因为某种原因从海底升起来的。
也就是说这里在过去有可能是大海。

20050156.Original_Text: 주변의 땅을 잘 찾아보면 조개류를 포함해 \n과거 이곳이 바다였던 증거를 찾을 수 있을지도 몰라요.
20050156.English_Text:
If we investigate the land around here, we might find seashells
that would prove this place used to be an ocean.
20050156.Chinese_Text:
在周围仔细寻找的话，
可能会找到贝壳类等证明这里过去曾是大海的证据。

20050157.English_Text: How can a <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>jellyfish</> live outside of water?
20050157.Chinese_Text: （很好奇水母如何能在水外生存）

20050158.English_Text: Well, first, I need to start researching that.
20050158.Chinese_Text: 那个部分是今后的研究课题之一。

20050159.Original_Text: 모종의 이유로 몸이 변이 되었다고 가정하고...\n여러 가지 형태의 변이가 발생했을 수 있겠죠.
20050159.English_Text:
I assume that they mutated for some reason...
There might have been several mutations over time, in fact.
20050159.Chinese_Text:
假设水母由于某种原因发生了变异...
有可能发生过各种形态的变异。

20050160.Original_Text: 그중에선 물에서 사는 형태의 <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>해파리</>도 있었을 것이고,\n물 밖에서도 살 수 있는 형태도 있었겠지요.
20050160.English_Text:
Among those mutations, there would've been a variation of a <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>jellyfish</> that lives in the water,
and another capable of living on land.
20050160.Chinese_Text:
其中有在水中生活的水母，
也有在水外生存的水母。

20050161.Original_Text: 즉, 다양한 변이 형태 중에서 여기서 살아남은 형태만을\n지금의 우리가 보고 있는지도 모릅니다.
20050161.English_Text:
That means, of the various mutations, we might be looking at
the only variation that managed to survive.
20050161.Chinese_Text:
也就是说，我们现在看到的是各种变异形态中
成功在这里存活下来的形态。

20050162.Original_Text: 하지만 사실은 저도 전혀 모릅니다.\n앞으로 연구해서 답을 찾을 수 있으면 좋겠네요.
20050162.English_Text:
But I don't know the truth.
I do hope I can find the answer through my research.
20050162.Chinese_Text:
不过我也无法断定结论。
希望今后能通过研究找到答案。

20050163.Original_Text: 이왕 여기까지 나왔는데... \n혹시 다른 연구도 도와주시면 안 될까요?
20050163.English_Text:
You've come all the way here...
Would you be willing to help me with my other research efforts, too?
20050163.Chinese_Text:
既然已经来到了这里...
是否可以帮忙进行其他研究呢？

20050164.English_Text: What kind of research is that?

20050165.Original_Text: 그게 전부터 꼭 하고 싶었던 연구가 있었는데\n저 혼자 하기에는 너무 고난도라고 할까요?
20050165.English_Text:
There was a research project I've always wanted to do,
but let's just say that it was too difficult for me to do alone.
20050165.Chinese_Text:
我从以前开始就很想进行一个研究，
但对我来说难度太高了。

20050166.Original_Text: (자신은 연구자가 아니라 도움이 안될 거라고 한다)
20050166.English_Text: I might not be too helpful since I'm not a scientist.
20050166.Chinese_Text: （说自己不是研究员，可能帮不上忙）

20050167.Original_Text: 고난도라는 게 뭐냐 하면... 위험도가 높다?\n고위험도 같은 거예요.
20050167.English_Text:
When I say difficult... I mean it's dangerous.
It's very dangerous.
20050167.Chinese_Text:
难度太高的意思应该说是...很危险？
也就是危险度很高。

20050168.Original_Text: 엄청 강력하고 무서운 괴물이 살고 있거든요.\n잘못 들어갔다가... 제 유작이 될 것 같아서...
20050168.English_Text:
There's a powerful and scary monster living there.
If I tried to do any research there, it'd be the last work that I'd leave behind for the world...
20050168.Chinese_Text:
那里有非常强大的可怕怪物。
一不小心...我就要留下遗作...

20050169.Original_Text: 연구 성공도 못했을 테니 유작도 못 되겠네요.\n어쨌든 그렇게 될까 봐 시도도 못 해본 연구입니다.
20050169.English_Text:
Actually, if that monster killed me, there wouldn't be any work for me to leave, would there?
Anyway... that's the reason I couldn't even attempt that research.
20050169.Chinese_Text:
如果研究失败的话，也不会存在什么遗作吧。
总之我怕会变成这样，所以根本不敢尝试进行这个研究。

20050170.Original_Text: 일단은 안 보이네요. 흔적을 한번 찾아볼게요.
20050170.English_Text: I can't see it from here. I'll try looking for some clues.
20050170.Chinese_Text: 现在还看不到。我先寻找一下痕迹。

20050172.Original_Text: 제가 흔적을 찾는 동안 주변에 접근하는\n적들을 정리해 주시겠어요?
20050172.English_Text:
Could you eliminate any approaching enemies
while I look for clues?
20050172.Chinese_Text:
在我寻找痕迹的时候，
可以帮忙清理周围接近的敌人吗？

20050174.English_Text: Let's go in from over there.

20050175.Original_Text: 이제부터 좀 위험해질 수도 있으니\n절 잘 보호해주셔야 합니다.
20050175.English_Text:
It may get dangerous from here on out,
so please protect me.
20050175.Chinese_Text:
从现在开始可能会有一些危险，
请好好保护我。

20050178.Original_Text: 성과요? 이 주변에 뭔가 있다는 건 확실합니다.
20050178.English_Text: Progress? I'm certain there's something nearby.
20050178.Chinese_Text: 成果吗？我能确定这附近有什么东西。

20050179.Original_Text: 아직 외형을 확인한 건 아니지만...\n뭔가 굉장한 게 있다는 건 알아냈습니다.
20050179.English_Text:
I haven't been able to fully confirm it yet...
But I think I'm onto something pretty great.
20050179.Chinese_Text:
虽然还不敢确定其外形...
但我知道这里有非常惊人的东西。

20050180.English_Text: The atmosphere in the area feels strange.

20050181.English_Text:
I don't know the exact location...
but it's definitely nearby.
20050181.Chinese_Text:
还不知道准确位置...
但肯定就在附近。

20050182.Original_Text: 주변을 뒤지다 보면 \n찾을 수 있을 것 같습니다만...
20050182.English_Text:
If we search the area,
we'll definitely find it...
20050182.Chinese_Text:
只要仔细搜查附近
应该就能找到...

20050183.English_Text:
I think we should stop here
since it might be too dangerous.
20050183.Chinese_Text:
但感觉很危险，
这次就到此为止吧。

20050184.Original_Text: (학자들은 위험을 자주 감수하는 게 아니냐고 한다)
20050184.English_Text: As far as I know, scholars typically don't often take risks.
20050184.Chinese_Text: （问学者们不是经常冒着风险吗）

20050185.Original_Text: 뭐 그런 사람들도 있겠지만...\n전 오래 살아서 많은 결과물을 남기고 싶거든요.
20050185.English_Text:
Well, some scholars can be pretty bold and foolhardy...
But I prefer to be careful. I can't die before finishing my work.
20050185.Chinese_Text:
当然也有那种人...
但我希望活得久一点，然后留下更多成果。

20050186.Original_Text: 명을 단축하고 싶은 게 아니라면...\n더 이상 괴물을 찾는 일을 권하고 싶진 않네요.
20050186.English_Text:
If you really value your life...
I'd advise against searching for that monster.
20050186.Chinese_Text:
如果不想短命的话...
我不会再建议你寻找怪物。

20050188.Original_Text: 아니. 내가 연구를 하겠다는데 도와주진 못할망정 방해를 해?
20050188.English_Text: How could you? All I wanted to do was continue my research. How dare you interfere with my work?
20050188.Chinese_Text: 什么，你不帮我进行研究也罢了，竟然还来妨碍我？

20050189.English_Text: Sir, we're only telling you this because it's dangerous.
20050189.Chinese_Text: 学者先生，我只是提醒这里有危险而已。

20050190.English_Text: The <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Blueskins</> roam this area. It's not safe.
20050190.Chinese_Text: 这里有青人族出没，真的很危险。

20050191.English_Text: We should leave. It's too dangerous.

20050192.Original_Text: 내가 여기서 밥을 먹겠다고 했냐!\n내가 여기서 잠을 자겠다고 했냐!
20050192.English_Text:
Didn't I say I'd eat here!?
Didn't I say I'd sleep here!?
20050192.Chinese_Text:
难道我说要在这里吃饭吗！
还是我说要在这里睡觉了！

20050193.Original_Text: 못 나가! 내가 죽으면 관에 넣어서 옮겨라!
20050193.English_Text: I won't leave! If you make me leave, it'll be in a coffin!
20050193.Chinese_Text: 我不走！如果我死了，把我放进棺材里搬走！

20050195.Original_Text: 순찰 중에 학자님이 위험하게 계셔서요.\n여기는 위험하니 나가 달라고 했습니다.
20050195.English_Text:
During our patrol, we found the scholar in a dangerous area.
We asked him to leave because it's unsafe.
20050195.Chinese_Text:
我在巡逻中发现学者先生处于危险环境中。
所以我提醒他说这里很危险，让他离开这里。

20050196.Original_Text: 뭐야? 난 학자야. 학자라고! 감히 내 연구를 막는 거냐?
20050196.English_Text: What? I'm a scholar. A scholar! How dare you try to stop me from working!?
20050196.Chinese_Text: 什么？我可是学者，学者！你胆敢妨碍我进行研究？

20050197.Original_Text: 비록 인정을 못 받아서 연구비도 못 타고 있지만...\n내가 돈이 없지, 자존심이 없는지 알아?
20050197.English_Text:
I might not be highly recognized, and I may not have any funding...
But even without money, I still have my pride!
20050197.Chinese_Text:
虽然这个研究项目没有得到认可，因此无法领取研究费...
但我只是没钱而已，你以为我连自尊心都没有吗？

20050198.Original_Text: 사부님은 나한테 이런 거 연구하면\n돈이 안 된다고 주제를 바꾸라고 했지만...
20050198.English_Text:
My teacher told me my theory wasn't worthwhile,
and that I should focus on something else...
20050198.Chinese_Text:
师父说我研究这种事情
无法赚钱，让我改变研究主题...

20050199.Original_Text: 그냥 굶어 죽거나 연구를 관두고 말지.\n날 막지는 못한다. 이 녀석들아!
20050199.English_Text:
I'd rather starve to death than give up on my research.
I'll never quit!
20050199.Chinese_Text:
但我宁可饿死或放弃研究。
你们休想阻止我，混账！

20050200.English_Text: What do you want to do?

20050201.Original_Text: 위험하면 너희들이 옆에서 지켜주면 될 거 아니냐!
20050201.English_Text: You can stay by my side and protect me if you think it's too dangerous!
20050201.Chinese_Text: 如果有危险的话，你们来保护我不就可以了吗！

20050202.Original_Text: 저희가 매번 지켜드릴 수도 없는 노릇 아닙니까?
20050202.English_Text: You can't possibly expect us to remain here the entire time and protect you.
20050202.Chinese_Text: 但是我们也不能一直跟在身边呀？

20050203.Original_Text: 그럼 그냥 내가 죽겠다고 하잖아.\n방해좀 하지 말라고!
20050203.English_Text:
I'll say it again. I'll die if I have to.
Just don't interfere with my work!
20050203.Chinese_Text:
我自己愿意冒着生命危险。
你们不要阻拦我！

20050204.English_Text: You're not making this any easier.

20050205.Original_Text: 여기에 있는 지층은 지표면에 있을 게 아니라 \n땅속 깊은 곳에 있을 것들이야.
20050205.English_Text:
The strata here shouldn't be on the surface,
but deep inside the ground.
20050205.Chinese_Text:
这里的地层不应该在地表面，
应该在地下深处。

20050206.Original_Text: 이건 땅이 솟아올랐다는 증거가 될 게다!
20050206.English_Text: This is proof that the land rose up!
20050206.Chinese_Text: 这应该是地面升起的证据！

20050207.Original_Text: (용이 떨어져서 땅이 솟아올랐다는 건 \n다들 알고 있는 거 아니냐고 한다)
20050207.English_Text:
Everybody knows that a dragon fell
and the land rose up from the aftermath of the impact.
20050207.Chinese_Text:
（问大家不是都知道龙掉下来之后
地面升起来的吗）

20050208.Original_Text: 네가 봤어? 봤냐고? \n용 떨어지고 땅이 올라오는 거 봤어?
20050208.English_Text:
Did you see it for yourself? Did you?
Did you see the dragon fall and the land rise?
20050208.Chinese_Text:
你看到了？看到了？
你看到龙掉下来之后地面升起吗？

20050209.Original_Text: (이야기를 들어 마치 본 것 같지만\n실제로 본 적은 없다고 한다)
20050209.English_Text:
The stories I've heard seem true.
But of course I've never witnessed it.
20050209.Chinese_Text:
（表示只听别人说过，
但没有亲眼看过）

20050210.Original_Text: 난 용이 떨어졌는지까진 모르겠고...\n땅이 솟아올랐다는 가설을 뒷받침하는 증거물을 찾는 거지.
20050210.English_Text:
I don't care for tall tales about falling dragons...
I just want to find evidence to prove that the land rose up.
20050210.Chinese_Text:
我不管龙有没有掉下来...
我只是在寻找能够证明地面升起的证据而已。

20050211.English_Text: I've found some great evidence, thanks to you! I appreciate it!
20050211.Chinese_Text: 多亏了你，我找到了很有用的资料！谢谢！

20050212.Original_Text: 그리고 <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>대원</>! 아깐 말이 과했네. 용서해 주게.\n자네가 임무를 다하고 있다는 것은 알고 있네.
20050212.English_Text:
And <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>you</>! I'm sorry for being rude earlier. Please forgive me.
I know you were just doing your job.
20050212.Chinese_Text:
还有队员！我之前说话很过分，希望你原谅我。
我也知道你很尽心尽责。

20050213.Original_Text: <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>청인족</>들을 상대하느라 힘들다는 사실도 알고 있고...\n항상 감사히 생각하고 있다네
20050213.English_Text:
I know you've been having a hard time dealing with the <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Blueskins</>...
And I'm always grateful for your help.
20050213.Chinese_Text:
我也知道对付青人族很辛苦...
我一直心怀感激。

20050214.Original_Text: 부탁이 하나 있네. 꼭 들어주면 좋겠군.
20050214.English_Text: I have a favor to ask. I hope you'll hear me out.
20050214.Chinese_Text: 我想请求你一件事。希望你能打赢。

20050215.English_Text: Let me hear about it first.

20050216.Original_Text: 이곳에 나 말고도 여러 명의 <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>지질학자</>가 왔었다네.\n그런데 이상하게도 모두 자취를 감췄어.
20050216.English_Text:
There were several <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>geologists</> that came before me.
But for some reason, they all disappeared.
20050216.Chinese_Text:
除了我，还有好几名地质学者来到了这里。
可是大家都离奇地失踪了。

20050218.Original_Text: 아직 확실한 건 아무것도 없다네.\n하지만 혹시 납치라도 당한 게 아닌가 싶어서...
20050218.English_Text:
There's no concrete evidence yet.
I thought they might've been kidnapped.
20050218.Chinese_Text:
还无法确定。
但我怕他们被绑架了...

20050219.Original_Text: 난 이곳에서 물론 연구를 진행 중이지만\n그와 동시에 동료들을 찾는 중이라네.
20050219.English_Text:
While I've been conducting my research here,
I've also been looking for my colleagues at the same time.
20050219.Chinese_Text:
我在这里不仅进行研究，
同时还在寻找伙伴。

20050220.Original_Text: 이제부터 갈 곳은 나 혼자 가기엔 너무 위험한 곳이야.\n자넨 싸움 좀 하는 것 같은데 같이 가주게나.
20050220.English_Text:
Where I'm heading to now is too dangerous for me to go alone.
Since you seem to be able to handle yourself in a fight, I was hoping you'd accompany me.
20050220.Chinese_Text:
这里对我一个人来说过于危险。
你的武艺不错，跟我一起去吧。

20050221.Original_Text: 사람들의 흔적을 찾았어. \n이게 납치범들의 흔적일지도 몰라.
20050221.English_Text:
I've found some clues that people were here.
They might have been the kidnappers.
20050221.Chinese_Text:
我找到了人们的痕迹。
这可能是绑架犯留下的痕迹。

20050222.English_Text: Are the scholars going to be all right?

20050223.Original_Text: 그건 모르지. 근데 학자들을 어디에 쓰려는 걸까?
20050223.English_Text: I don't know. But why in the world would anyone want those scholars?
20050223.Chinese_Text: 那可不好说。不过他们想利用学者们做什么？

20050224.English_Text: Maybe for ransom money? But there's been no contact from them...
20050224.Chinese_Text: 难道想索要赎金？可我们也没有接到联系...

20050225.English_Text: It might not be a kidnapping.

20050226.Original_Text: 그럼... 설마? 아니야... 그럴 일은 없겠지...\n설마 내가 싫어서 연락을 끊은 건가?
20050226.English_Text:
Then... perhaps? No... That can't be possible...
Did they cut off communication because they didn't like me?
20050226.Chinese_Text:
那么...难道？不...这应该不可能...
难道是因为讨厌我才断了联系？

20050227.English_Text: (I can't say or do anything except for lowering my head...)

20050228.English_Text: Ah... You think it could be true?

20050229.Chinese_Text:
请不要攻击我们！
我们是人类。

20050231.English_Text:
It's that weird old man! <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Won Tozi</>!
How did you get here?
20050231.Chinese_Text:
这不是怪老爷子吗！元土地！
怎么会出现在这里？

20050232.Original_Text: 괴짜 할배 <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>원토지</> 선생님이라고 불러! 이것들아!\n외형은 변했지만 누군지 알겠어.
20050232.English_Text:
Call me old weirdo <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Won Tozi</>!
He may look different, but I can tell who he is.
20050232.Chinese_Text:
叫我怪老爷子元土地老师！你们这些家伙！
虽然外貌改变，但我还能认出你们。

20050233.English_Text: You admit that you're an old weirdo?
20050233.Chinese_Text: （问是否承认自己是怪老爷子）

20050234.Original_Text: 뭐... 그건 인정해야지.\n근데 지금 그게 궁금해?
20050234.English_Text:
Well... I have to admit, that sounds like me.
Is that what you're most curious about right now?
20050234.Chinese_Text:
这个嘛...只能承认。
不过现在这种事重要吗？

20050235.English_Text:
Aren't you wondering who these people are?
They're the missing scholars.
20050235.Chinese_Text:
你不想知道这些人是谁？
他们就是失踪的学者。

20050236.Original_Text: 우린 연구 중에 몸이 이렇게 변했어요.\n전염병인 것 같아요...
20050236.English_Text:
Our bodies changed like this during our research.
We believe it to be contagious...
20050236.Chinese_Text:
我们的身体在研究过程中变成了这样。
我想应该是传染病...

20050237.Original_Text: 할배도 살날도 얼마 안 남았는데\n여기서 이러지 말고 빨리 떠나세요.
20050237.English_Text:
Gramps, you don't have many years left to live.
You should get away from here.
20050237.Chinese_Text:
老爷子剩下的日子也不多了，
不要停留在这里，快离开吧。

20050238.Original_Text: 연구 같은 거로 시간 허비하지 말고요.
20050238.English_Text: Don't waste your life on this research.
20050238.Chinese_Text: 请不要浪费时间在研究上。

20050239.Original_Text: 음... 여기에서 본 건 비밀로 해주게나.
20050239.English_Text: Hmm... Please keep what you've seen here a secret.
20050239.Chinese_Text: 唔...在这里看到的事情就当做秘密吧。

20050240.Original_Text: 내가 이들을 조사해서 병을 낫게 해보겠네.\n어떻게든 <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>연구지</>로 데려가야지...
20050240.English_Text:
I'll investigate this and cure them of this disease.
First, I have to take them back to my <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>research site</>.
20050240.Chinese_Text:
我要对他们进行研究，然后治好他们。
无论如何都要带回研究地...

20050241.English_Text: It's too dangerous if it's contagious.

20050242.Original_Text: 전염되는 거 확인한 적 있어?\n난 증거가 없으면 쉽게 안 믿는 사람이야.
20050242.English_Text:
How do you know it's contagious?
Until I have evidence, I won't assume that.
20050242.Chinese_Text:
你确认这是传染病？
除非有证据，否则我不会轻易相信。

20050243.Chinese_Text: （表示当事人都说了是传染病）

20050244.Original_Text: 당사자가 자기 병을 잘 안다고?\n그럼 의사한테 진찰받을 필요도 없겠구만!
20050244.English_Text:
Oh, is he an expert on that disease, then?
In that case, why consult a physician?
20050244.Chinese_Text:
当事人就一定知道自己的病？
那还需要医生做什么！

20050245.Original_Text: 어쨌든 다음은 내가 알아서 할 테니... \n자넨 가보게.
20050245.English_Text:
I'll do what I have to do...
You can go now.
20050245.Chinese_Text:
总之，接下来就交给我...
你去做自己的事吧。

20050246.English_Text: What are you going to do with the scholars?

20050247.Original_Text: 나같은 건 신경쓰지 말고 빨리 떠나게.\n전염병이 아니라는 증거도 없잖아.
20050247.English_Text:
Don't worry about me and just go.
There's no evidence that it's contagious.
20050247.Chinese_Text:
不要管我这种人，快离开吧。
也没有证据显示这不是传染病。

20050248.English_Text: Is there a solution if it is contagious?
20050248.Chinese_Text: （问如果确实是传染病，是否还有对策）

20050249.Original_Text: 무슨 일이든 방법은 있지.\n제대로 해결된다는 보장이 없어서 문제지.
20050249.English_Text:
Everything has a solution.
The only problem is whether I can completely solve this issue.
20050249.Chinese_Text:
凡事都有解决方法。
问题在于无法保证一定能完美解决。

20050250.Original_Text: 그러니까 일단 원인부터 파악할 필요가 있어.\n첫째로 저들이 말하는 대로 전염병이라는 가설
20050250.English_Text:
That's why we must identify the cause.
The first hypothesis is that it's contagious, as they say it is.
20050250.Chinese_Text:
总之，需要先了解原因。
第一个假设是他们所说的传染病。

20050251.Original_Text: "아니면 남쪽에 있다고 소문난 괴물인 <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>유강독모</>\n그 녀석이 병균을 퍼트렸을지도 모르지."
20050251.English_Text:
It may also come from that notorious monster, <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Venomous Mutant</>, from the south.
It might be the source of the disease.
20050251.Chinese_Text:
也有可能是南边有名的怪物“塔里特”
散播了病菌。

20050253.Original_Text: 나도 몰라. \n일단 가능성 있는 걸 나열해 보는 거야.
20050253.English_Text:
I don't know.
I'm just listing the possibilities.
20050253.Chinese_Text:
我也不清楚。
我只是先列出各种可能性而已。

20050254.Original_Text: 근데 그런 거였으면 지질학자들만 걸리는 게 이상하잖아.
20050254.English_Text: But, if it was contagious, it's strange that only the geologists are being affected.
20050254.Chinese_Text: 但如果是这样就无法解释为什么只有地质学者患病。

20050255.Original_Text: 난 오히려 우리가 조사하는 돌이나 흙에 뭔가가 있는 것 같아.\n조사 좀 도와줘야겠는데?
20050255.English_Text:
On the contrary, I believe there's something in the rocks or dirt we're researching.
Could you help me investigate?
20050255.Chinese_Text:
我觉得应该是我们调查的石头或土存在问题。
可以请你来帮忙调查吗？

20050256.Original_Text: 여기 있는 표본을 모아 주겠나?\n그걸 조사해보면 뭔가 알아낼 수 있을 거야.
20050256.English_Text:
Could you gather the samples here?
We'll be able to shed some light on all this if we investigate it.
20050256.Chinese_Text:
可以帮忙搜集一下这里的标本吗？
调查标本的话应该能发现什么。

20050257.Original_Text: (돌이나 흙에 뭔가가 있다면 \n만지는 게 위험한 게 아니냐고 묻는다)
20050257.English_Text:
Isn't it too dangerous if there turns out
to be something in the rocks or dirt?
20050257.Chinese_Text:
（问如果石头或土存在问题，
触摸是不是很危险）

20050258.Original_Text: 아! 그렇군. 맞아!\n혹시 이 가설이 맞다면 위험할 수도 있겠군.
20050258.English_Text:
Ah! Right. You're absolutely right!
If that hypothesis is correct, it will certainly be dangerous.
20050258.Chinese_Text:
啊！对呀，没错！
如果这个假设是正确的，那确实很危险。

20050259.Original_Text: 그럼 표본은 내가 채집하겠네.\n그럼 그동안 주변을 정리해 주게나.
20050259.English_Text:
Then, I'll be the one to collect the sample.
Please keep an eye on the area while I do my work.
20050259.Chinese_Text:
那么让我来搜集标本吧。
你帮我清理一下周围。

20050260.Original_Text: 만약 이게 사실이라면... <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>지질학자</>를 포함해서\n관련한 조사를 하는 모든 학자가 위험해.
20050260.English_Text:
If this is true... It's not just the <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>geologists</>,
but all the scholars at work here are in danger.
20050260.Chinese_Text:
如果这是真的...包括地质学者在内的
所有进行相关调查的学者都有危险。

20050261.Original_Text: (돌이나 흙을 만지는 모두가\n위험할 수 있겠다고 한다)
20050261.English_Text:
Everyone who came into contact
with the rocks and dirt are in danger.
20050261.Chinese_Text:
（表示接触石头或土的所有人
都有危险）

20050262.Original_Text: 그렇군. 석공들도 위험할 수 있겠어.\n여긴 아직 농사는 안 지으니까 그건 넘어가고...
20050262.English_Text:
Right. The stonemasons could be in danger, too.
Since we don't do any farming here yet, we can pass on that...
20050262.Chinese_Text:
没错。石匠们也有危险。
这里还没有开始种地，可以不考虑...

20050263.English_Text: The crew spending time near the rocks are also in danger.
20050263.Chinese_Text: 石头附近的队员们也有危险。

20050265.English_Text:
Certainly. We must investigate
as quickly as possible and save whoever we can.
20050265.Chinese_Text:
没错...需要尽快进行调查
才能救大家。

20050267.Original_Text: <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>연구지</>에 가야 해요.\n전할 물건이 있고, 받을 물건도 있어요.
20050267.English_Text:
I must go to my <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>research site</>.
I have things I need to deliver and things I'm expecting to arrive.
20050267.Chinese_Text:
我打算去<textColor=[110:216:175:255]>研究地</>。
我需要把东西送到那里，顺便带回一点东西。

20050268.Original_Text: (가는 길이 좀 멀고 위험할 수 있다고 한다)
20050268.English_Text: The journey may be long and dangerous.
20050268.Chinese_Text: （说路途有点远，也可能遇到危险）

20050269.English_Text: Even so, we still have to go. I made a promise.
20050269.Chinese_Text: 但我还是要去，因为已经说好了…

20050270.Original_Text: (자신이 물건을 전달해 줄 수도 있다고 한다)

20050271.Original_Text: 아니에요. 연구원이 되고 맡은 첫 번째 임무니까...\n스스로 해내야 해요.
20050271.English_Text:
Thank you, but no. It's my first mission as a researcher.
I have to do this myself.
20050271.Chinese_Text:
没关系。这是我成为研究员之后的第一个任务…
一定要亲手做到。

20050272.English_Text: If you arrive at the <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>Destroyed Rocks</>, follow the wide road...
20050272.Chinese_Text: 他们告诉我说，到<textColor=[110:216:175:255]>破石喝彩</>之后，顺着大路一直走下去…

20050273.Original_Text: 괴물이 나타나면 숨어있다가 좌우를 살피고 이동하라고 했어요.
20050273.English_Text: I was told if I encountered a monster, I should hide and move carefully checking my surroundings.
20050273.Chinese_Text: 遇到怪物就要藏起来，查看周围之后再继续移动。

20050274.Original_Text: 소리를 내면 괴물들이 눈치챌 수도 있으니까, 조용히 해야 해요.
20050274.English_Text: The monsters may find out if we make any noise, so we should be quiet.
20050274.Chinese_Text: 发出声音的话可能会被怪物发现，所以要保持安静。

20050277.Original_Text: 괜찮아요. 긴장 같은 건 전혀 안 했어요.
20050277.English_Text: I'm fine. I'm not nervous at all.
20050277.Chinese_Text: 没问题。我一点都不紧张。

20050278.Chinese_Text: （表示很容易看出来对方在紧张）

20050279.Original_Text: 아니에요. 지금 이 기구들을 기다리는 분들이 계시니까...\n빨리 가야 해요.
20050279.English_Text:
It's no problem. There are people waiting for this equipment.
We must hurry.
20050279.Chinese_Text:
不。他们正在等着这些东西…
我必须加快脚步。

20050281.Original_Text: 괜찮아요. 마음이 안정되는 환약도 절반 먹었고...
20050281.English_Text: It's really fine. I ate half of my relaxation pills, after all.
20050281.Chinese_Text: 没问题。我已经吃了半个定心丸…

20050282.Original_Text: 아직은 안 보이지만... 들은 이야기로는 조금만 더 가면 될 거예요.
20050282.English_Text: I don't see it yet, but from what I've been told, we just need to go a little further.
20050282.Chinese_Text: 虽然还没有看到目的地…但根据他们所说，只要再走一点就到了。

20050284.Original_Text: 아. 포기하지 않고 한 발짝 두 발짝 걸어온 게 도움이 되었네요.
20050284.English_Text: Ah. I guess walking diligently without giving up was the right choice.
20050284.Chinese_Text: 哇，果然一步一个脚印走来就能成功，绝不应该放弃。

20050286.Original_Text: 덕분입니다. 학자가 되기까지 혼자 집에서 공부만 했는데...
20050286.English_Text: It's all thanks to you. All I did to become a scholar was study all alone at home.
20050286.Chinese_Text: 多谢你的帮助。我在成为学者之前一直在家埋头苦读…

20050287.Original_Text: 이렇게 바깥에 나오니 위험한 일도 많고...
20050287.English_Text: I had no idea there were so many dangerous things in the outside world.
20050287.Chinese_Text: 出门在外发现有很多危险的事…

20050288.Original_Text: 그 대신 이렇게 도움을 주는 사람도 있는 거네요.
20050288.English_Text: Then again, there are also people like you who help others.
20050288.Chinese_Text: 不过也会遇到像你这样助人为乐的人。

20050289.Original_Text: 저도 연구 열심히 해서 세상에 도움이 되는 사람이 되고 싶어요!
20050289.English_Text: I'll work hard so that I can help others with my research!
20050289.Chinese_Text: 我也希望通过自己的研究造福全人类！

20050291.English_Text:
Greetings, warrior!
I have a favor to ask of you.
20050291.Chinese_Text:
你好，少侠！
我有一事相求。

20050292.English_Text: I want to get my hands on <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Hoglin</> weapons.
20050292.Chinese_Text: 我想获得一点<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>血猪族</>的武器。

20050293.English_Text: There are plenty of <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Hoglins</> in the area.
20050293.Chinese_Text: （问附近不是有很多<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>血猪族</>吗？）

20050294.Original_Text: 제가 무도에 큰 재능이 없어서\n제힘으론 좀...
20050294.English_Text:
I don't have that much talent when it comes to martial arts,
so it's a little hard to get them myself.
20050294.Chinese_Text:
可是我的武功天分不高，
凭自己的能力很难…

20050295.Original_Text: 무도가에게 있어 무도 자체가 제일 중요한 건\n당연하고, 저도 동의합니다만...
20050295.English_Text:
I know and agree that skills
are what's most important for martial artists.
20050295.Chinese_Text:
对武者来说，武功本身最为重要，
我也知道这一点…

20050296.Original_Text: 저는 계속 무기나 장비 쪽으로 눈이 돌아가더라고요.
20050296.English_Text: But, I just can't shake off my interest in weapons and gear.
20050296.Chinese_Text: 可我的注意力总是转向武器和装备。

20050297.Original_Text: 아니 강한 무도가가 더 좋은 장비를 가지면 \n더 강해질 거잖아요.
20050297.English_Text:
I mean, if a strong warrior gets better gear, 
it's obvious that warrior would be stronger.
20050297.Chinese_Text:
强大的武者拥有更好的装备
不是会变得更强吗？

20050299.English_Text: Then, I'll leave it to you.

20050300.Chinese_Text: 非常感谢！这样就足够了。

20050301.Original_Text: 이게... 같은 무기인데도 형태가 다르고\n품질 차이가 좀 있네요.
20050301.English_Text:
This... It's the same weapon,
but it has a different shape and quality.
20050301.Chinese_Text:
这个…虽然都是相同的武器，
但形态不一，而且品质也有出入。

20050303.Original_Text: 확실히 대충 보면...\n조잡한 부분이 있긴 하네요.
20050303.English_Text:
It's certainly a little crude
at first glance.
20050303.Chinese_Text:
随便一看的话…
确实有粗糙的部分。

20050304.Original_Text: 하지만 좀 더 자세히 뜯어 보겠습니다.
20050304.English_Text: Well, I'll give it a closer inspection.
20050304.Chinese_Text: 我会更仔细地查看一下。

20050305.Original_Text: 그래도 그 조잡함 속에서도 \n만드는 자들은 고민이 있었을 테고
20050305.English_Text:
Even if it may look crude, there must 
be a reason why they made it this way.
20050305.Chinese_Text:
虽然有些粗糙，
但制造武器的匠人们肯定也有自己的考虑。

20050306.Original_Text: 그 안에서 뭔가 새로운 발상을\n얻을 수 있을 거로 생각합니다.
20050306.English_Text:
And if I research into the design,
I believe I can get something out of it.
20050306.Chinese_Text:
我认为应该可以
从中学到新的东西。

20050308.English_Text: Please, you've got to help settle something for me!

20050310.Original_Text: 저기 <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>단풍 노을 골짜기</>에 가면 <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>전갈</>들이 많이 사는데요.
20050310.English_Text: There're a lot of <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>scorpions</> living in <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>Autumn Sunset Valley</>.
20050310.Chinese_Text: 在那边的<textColor=[110:216:175:255]>枫霞峡谷</>栖息着很多<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>蝎子</>。

20050311.English_Text: But no matter how I think about it, the <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>scorpion</>'s trademark is its poison!

20050312.English_Text: Poison comes to mind when I think of a <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Scorpion</>.

20050313.Original_Text: 그렇죠? <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>전갈</>의 으뜸 무기는 역시 독 아니겠습니까?
20050313.English_Text: Right? Don't you agree that a <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>scorpion</>'s main weapon is its poison?
20050313.Chinese_Text: 没错吧？<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>蝎子</>最强的武器就是毒！

20050314.Original_Text: 근데 말이죠. \n저 옆에 있는 아무것도 모르는 어린 상인 녀석이 말입니다.
20050314.English_Text:
But you know what? 
That young merchant over there doesn't know anything.
20050314.Chinese_Text:
可是呢，
前面那个一无所知的新手商人…

20050315.Original_Text: <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>전갈</>은 <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>집게</>가 주요 무기니, 뭐니... \n말도 안 되죠. 그건!
20050315.English_Text:
He claims a <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>scorpion</>'s main weapon is its <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>pincers</>.
I mean, that's absurd!
20050315.Chinese_Text:
竟然说什么<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>蝎子</>的武器是<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>螯足</>…
真是荒谬！

20050316.Original_Text: 제 말은 제대로 들어먹질 않으니...\n말씀 한번 해 주십시오!
20050316.English_Text:
He won't listen to me.
So, could you please tell him?
20050316.Chinese_Text:
他完全不听我的话…
希望你跟他讲一讲！

20050317.English_Text:
(I should tell the story
about the <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>scorpion</>.)

20050318.Original_Text: 그렇게 생각할 수 있습니다.\n그럴 수 있겠죠!
20050318.English_Text:
You can think of it that way.
That's the simple way to see it, though!
20050318.Chinese_Text:
我能理解其他人的那种想法。
那也很正常！

20050319.English_Text:
Actually, a <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>scorpion</> with lethal poison
is a pretty weak <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>scorpion</>.
20050319.Chinese_Text:
但是！毒性强的<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>蝎子</>
是弱<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>蝎子</>。

20050320.Original_Text: 자기가 약하니까 자신을 지키기 위해서\n독을 사용하는 거예요.
20050320.English_Text:
It uses poison to protect itself
because it's physically weak.
20050320.Chinese_Text:
因为自己很弱，若以才会用毒
保护自己。

20050321.Original_Text: <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>집게</>가 강한 <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>전갈</>에게 독은 보조일 뿐\n강할 필요가 없거든요.
20050321.English_Text:
A <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>scorpion</> with strong <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>pincers</>
doesn't really need poison.
20050321.Chinese_Text:
对于拥有强大<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>螯足</>的<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>蝎子</>来说，
毒只是辅助武器而已。

20050322.English_Text:
Does a <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>scorpion</> with strong <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>pincers</>
have weak poison?
20050322.Chinese_Text:
（问拥有强大<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>螯足</>的<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>蝎子</>
毒性是否一定很弱）

20050323.Original_Text: 강한 독이 필요가 없으니까요.\n<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>전갈</>의 으뜸 무기, <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>집게</>가 있는데!
20050323.English_Text:
Yes, and that's because it has no need for lethal poison.
It already has its <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>pincers</>!
20050323.Chinese_Text:
那种<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>蝎子</>不需要剧毒。
只要有它们的最强武器，<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>螯足</>就足够了！

20050324.Original_Text: 왜 상대를 잡아 놓고!\n침을 꽂고! 독액 넣고! 어이구!
20050324.English_Text:
Its power is in its pincers!
Why would it sting, then, slowly inflicting its venom? That takes too long!
20050324.Chinese_Text:
压制敌人之后！
还要用尾刺！还要注入毒液！哎哟！

20050325.English_Text: Poison doesn't kill instantly, so wouldn't it get into danger if it's counterattacked?
20050325.Chinese_Text: 在这一过程中是不是遭到反击而死？

20050326.Original_Text: 독이 센 <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>전갈</>은 위험하니까 사람이 피하죠.\n<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>집게</>가 센 <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>전갈</>은 자기들이 공격하러 와요.
20050326.English_Text:
People avoid <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>scorpions</> with lethal poison.
However, the <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>scorpions</> with powerful <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>pincers</> are strong enough to just attack whoever they want.
20050326.Chinese_Text:
因为毒性强的<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>蝎子</>危险，所以人们都会避开它们。
但<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>螯足</>强大的<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>蝎子</>会主动攻击过来。

20050327.English_Text:
Scorpions with powerful <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>pincers</> are fast, too.
It's really terrifying!
20050327.Chinese_Text:
<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>螯足</>强大的家伙跑得也更快！
真是太可怕了！

20050330.Original_Text: 아! 근데... 이걸 어떻게 비교하면 좋죠?
20050330.English_Text: Ah! But, how should we compare the two?
20050330.Chinese_Text: 啊！不过…这该如何比较呢？

20050331.English_Text: Well, we would try comparing their intensity and hardness.
20050331.Chinese_Text: 若都是螯足，可以比较强度或硬度。

20050332.English_Text: Or compare the lethality if they were both poison...
20050332.Chinese_Text: 若都是毒，可以比较致死率，但…

20050334.Original_Text: 아니, 아니요! \n뭔가 더 해달란 말은 아니었습니다.
20050334.English_Text:
No, no! 
We weren't asking you to do more.
20050334.Chinese_Text:
啊，不是的！
我并不是想要求你做更多事情。

20050335.Original_Text: 이렇게 되고 나니까\n말도 안 되는 말다툼을 했구나 싶네요.
20050335.English_Text:
Now that things have turned out this way,
I realize our argument really was absurd.
20050335.Chinese_Text:
我只是觉得
做了无谓的争论。

20050336.English_Text:
I always get into strange arguments
when I talk to that guy.
20050336.Chinese_Text:
每次跟那家伙说话
都会被牵着鼻子走。

20050339.English_Text: Is it? I thought it was normal.
20050339.Chinese_Text: 是吗？我还以为自己很平凡…

20050340.English_Text: Your voice is loud as well.

20050341.Original_Text: 제가 <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>풍백문</>에서 벌채를 맡고 있는데요.\n현장에서 일할 때는 목소리를 키우다 보니...
20050341.English_Text:
I'm in charge of logging at <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Ivory Gale</>.
And I need to raise my voice when I'm at work.
20050341.Chinese_Text:
我在<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>风白门</>负责伐木。
在现场工作时需要大声讲话…

20050342.Original_Text: 아! 그건 그렇다 치고... 문제가 하나 있습니다.
20050342.English_Text: Ah! Anyways, we have a problem.
20050342.Chinese_Text: 对了！先不说这个…有一个难题。

20050343.English_Text: There are too many <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Mandaravas</> at the <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>Lumber Camp</>.
20050343.Chinese_Text: 最近<textColor=[110:216:175:255]>伐木场</>的<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>曼陀罗花</>数量突增。

20050344.Original_Text: 작업자들이 위험해서\n일을 못 하겠다고 할 정도예요.
20050344.English_Text:
The workers are refusing to work
because of the danger they pose.
20050344.Chinese_Text:
工人们都说很危险，
快到了无法工作的地步。

20050345.English_Text: I took care of the <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Mandaravas</> at the <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>Lumber Camp</>.
20050345.Chinese_Text: （转告已经消除<textColor=[110:216:175:255]>伐木场</>的<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>曼陀罗花</>）

20050347.English_Text:
The <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Mandaravas</> are dangerous.
And they're very noisy.
20050347.Chinese_Text:
（说<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>曼陀罗花</>不仅很危险，
噪音也很严重）

20050348.Chinese_Text: 噪音？<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>曼陀罗花</>的噪音很严重吗？

20050350.Original_Text: 그래요? 제가 작업에 너무 몰두했었나 봅니다.
20050350.English_Text: Is that so? I must've been too focused on my work.
20050350.Chinese_Text: 是吗？可能是我太专注于工作了。

20050351.Original_Text: (소음으로 인해 청력이 떨어졌을 수\n있으니 의원을 찾아가 보라고 한다)
20050351.English_Text:
You should go seek a Healer.
Your hearing may have been damaged from the noise.
20050351.Chinese_Text:
（表示可能是噪音导致了他的听力下降，
劝他去找医生）

20050352.Original_Text: 아. 그런가? 생각해보니 그럴 수 있겠네요.
20050352.English_Text: Ah. I never thought of it that way, but you have a point.
20050352.Chinese_Text: 诶，是吗？仔细一想，确实有这个可能性。

20050353.Original_Text: (그리고 작업자들을 위해서 소음방지\n장비가 있으면 좋겠다고 한다)
20050353.English_Text:
There should be hearing protection
for the workers working on the field.
20050353.Chinese_Text:
（说最好为伐木场的工人
提供防噪音设备）

20050354.English_Text: That's really good advice! I'll try reporting it right away.
20050354.Chinese_Text: 真是个好主意！我一定会向上级建议。

20050355.English_Text:
You don't look all right.
Is everything okay?
20050355.Chinese_Text:
（说脸色看起来很苍白，
问是不是不舒服）

20050356.English_Text: I'm fine. I'm used to this.
20050356.Chinese_Text: 没关系。这已经不是一两天的问题。

20050357.Original_Text: (이런 상태가 오래 이어졌다는 건\n괜찮은 게 아닌 것 같다고 한다)
20050357.English_Text:
It's not okay to be
used to being sick...
20050357.Chinese_Text:
（表示这种状态持续很长时间
不是好现象）

20050358.English_Text: Maybe? I don't have a choice, though.

20050359.Original_Text: 제가 이상하게 <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>잿빛 암각다귀</>만 보면...\n다리가 떨리고, 심장이 뛰고...
20050359.English_Text:
I don't know why, but when I see a <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Gray Darkhorn</>...
My legs shake, and my heart starts pounding...
20050359.Chinese_Text:
我只要看到<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>灰色暗角大鬼</>…
就会双腿颤抖，心脏乱跳…

20050360.English_Text:
I can't make a fist,
and my body gets sluggish.
20050360.Chinese_Text:
还无法握拳，
脚步也会变得沉重。

20050361.English_Text:
Do you have bad memories 
about <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Darkhorns</>?
20050361.Chinese_Text:
（问是不是有关于
<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>暗角大鬼</>的不好的回忆）

20050362.Original_Text: 아니요. 그런 건 아니에요.\n처음 봤을 때부터 그랬어요.
20050362.English_Text:
No. It's nothing like that.
It's just how I've always responded to them.
20050362.Chinese_Text:
不，并不是这样。
我第一次看到暗角大鬼时就已经这样了。

20050363.Original_Text: 뭔가 거대한 괴물이나 징그러운 것에 대한\n공포라고 생각했는데...
20050363.English_Text:
I thought maybe it's a fear of
giant monsters or anything disgusting...
20050363.Chinese_Text:
我以前认为这是因为害怕
巨大的怪物或恶心的东西…

20050364.Original_Text: 다른 것들을 봐도 그렇지 않은 걸 보면\n그것도 아닌 것 같고...
20050364.English_Text:
But then, I'm not affected
that way by anything else.
20050364.Chinese_Text:
但是我看到其他怪物时并没有那种感觉，
所以应该不是这个原因…

20050365.Original_Text: (자신이 <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>암각다귀</>를 제거할 테니\n근처로 와 볼 마음이 있냐 묻는다)
20050365.English_Text:
I'll take care of the <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Darkhorns</>.
How about that?
20050365.Chinese_Text:
（表示自己会去消灭<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>暗角大鬼</>，
问想不想去附近观看）

20050366.Original_Text: <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>숲의 장막</>에요? <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>잿빛 암각다귀</>가 좀 줄어들면\n한번 나가볼 수 있을 것 같긴 한데...
20050366.English_Text:
To the <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>Shelter of the Forest</>? I could
if there're fewer <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Gray Darkhorns</>...
20050366.Chinese_Text:
<textColor=[110:216:175:255]>森林帐幕</>吗？<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>灰色暗角大鬼</>数量减少的话，
我应该可以去看一下…

20050368.English_Text: I'm sorry. I wanted to go...

20050369.Original_Text: 움직이는데 <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>암각다귀</> 생각이 나서...\n다리가 떨려서 걸을 수가 없었어요.
20050369.English_Text:
But I thought of the <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Darkhorns</> on my way.
My legs were trembling so hard, I couldn't even walk.
20050369.Chinese_Text:
但是一想到<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>暗角大鬼</>…
我的双腿就颤抖不已，无法走路。

20050371.Original_Text: <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>암각다귀</>를 많이 처치해주셨을 텐데...\n왜 이리 겁이 나는지 모르겠습니다.
20050371.English_Text:
You must've taken care of so many <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Darkhorns</>...
I don't know why I'm still so scared.
20050371.Chinese_Text:
<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>暗角大鬼</>数量已经少了很多…
但我不知道为什么自己还是这么害怕。

20050372.English_Text: I don't know if a coward like me is worthy to be part of <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Ivory Gale</>.
20050372.Chinese_Text: 像我这么胆小的人可能并不适合<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>风白门</>。

20050373.Original_Text: 지금이라도 다른 길을 찾아봐야 할 것 같아요.
20050373.English_Text: I should try to find some way to fix this, even if it's too late.
20050373.Chinese_Text: 我想还是早点另寻出路算了。

20050374.English_Text: Take some time to think it over.

20050375.Original_Text: (<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>풍백문</>에 좋은 의원이 있을 테니\n한번 가서 물어보라고 한다)
20050375.English_Text:
Go see a healer.
<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Ivory Gale</> should have a good one.
20050375.Chinese_Text:
（表示<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>风白门</>内应该有医术高超的大夫，
劝她去拜访一下）

20050376.English_Text: Yes. I will consider that, too.

20050377.English_Text: Hey, would you help settle something for me?
20050377.Chinese_Text: 可以听我说一点事情吗？

20050379.English_Text: There are <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Ratmen</> appearing at the <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>Gray Jungle</>.
20050379.Chinese_Text: 那边的<textColor=[110:216:175:255]>灰色密林</>里有<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>鼠人族</>出没。

20050380.English_Text: When it comes to the <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Ratmen</>, you think about their <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>teeth</>, don't you?
20050380.Chinese_Text: 我想了想，<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>鼠人族</>最大的特点不就是<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>牙齿</>吗？

20050381.Original_Text: (하긴 쥐라면 뭔가 갉아먹을 것 같다고 한다)
20050381.English_Text: Rats do remind me of protruding teeth.

20050382.English_Text: Right? I mean, <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>teeth</> and rats go hand in hand.

20050383.Original_Text: 근데 말입니다. 저 옆에 계시는 뭐 하나 제대로 \n알지도 못하시는 연세 있으신 상인분께서 말입니다.
20050383.English_Text:
But the problem is that old merchant 
who doesn't know any better.
20050383.Chinese_Text:
可是呢，我身边有一位一窍不通的
老爷子商人。

20050384.English_Text:
He's stubbornly claiming that the <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Ratmen</>
are all about <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>claws</>, not their teeth.
20050384.Chinese_Text:
他很固执地说，
<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>鼠人族</>最厉害的应该是<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>爪子</>。

20050385.Original_Text: 제 말은 이제 제대로 듣지도 않으시는데,\n제 말을 한번 전해주시지요.
20050385.English_Text:
He won't listen to me at all,
so could you please get him to understand?
20050385.Chinese_Text:
他完全不听我讲，
是否可以请你去转告一下我的想法呢。

20050386.English_Text:
(I should tell the story
about the <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Ratman</>.)
20050386.Chinese_Text:
（转告有关<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>鼠人族</>的
事情）

20050387.Original_Text: 주로 아직 미성숙한 아이들이\n<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>이빨</>에 집착하는 모습이 보이더군요.
20050387.English_Text:
Usually, young and immature people
have this obsession about <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>teeth</>.
20050387.Chinese_Text:
一般来讲，未成熟的幼儿们
才会执迷于<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>牙齿</>。

20050388.Original_Text: 뭐든 자기 입으로 가져가는 그런 느낌일까요?
20050388.English_Text: It's like toddlers putting everything to their mouths. Oral fixation!
20050388.Chinese_Text: 就好像把所有东西都塞进自己的嘴里一样。

20050390.English_Text: <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Claws</> are the sign of a grown-up creature.

20050391.Original_Text: 지속적인 관리를 하지 않으면\n제대로 사용할 수가 없죠.
20050391.English_Text:
If claws aren't managed right, then
they can't be used properly.
20050391.Chinese_Text:
若不经过持续护理
将无法正常使用。

20050392.Original_Text: <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>발톱</>으로 공격하는 것과 입으로 무는 것 중에\n어느 쪽이 지능적이란 생각이 드시나요?
20050392.English_Text:
Between attacking with your teeth and attacking with <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>claws</>,
which do you think is smarter?
20050392.Chinese_Text:
你觉得用<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>爪子</>攻击和用牙咬之中
哪个更为智能？

20050393.Original_Text: (둘 다 지능적으로 생각하지 않지만,\n굳이 골라야 한다면 <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>발톱</>이라고 한다)
20050393.English_Text:
I don't think either of them is smart.
But, if I must choose, it would be <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>claws</>.
20050393.Chinese_Text:
（认为两个都挺智能，
但非要选的话还是<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>爪子</>）

20050394.English_Text:
Right? <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Claws</>!
You can't imagine anything other than <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>claws</>.

20050395.English_Text: And we can compare the <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>claws</> and <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>teeth</>.
20050395.Chinese_Text: 而且我们可以比较一下<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>爪子</>和<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>牙齿</>。

20050396.English_Text: Could you get some of them for us?
20050396.Chinese_Text: 可以请你带来一些爪子和牙齿吗？

20050397.English_Text: Should this be good enough for comparison?
20050397.Chinese_Text: （问是否可以用这些进行比较）

20050399.Original_Text: 강도, 경도를 단순 비교하면\n<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>이빨</>이 압도적으로 강할 것 같은데
20050399.English_Text:
If we simply compare the intensity
and hardness, the <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>teeth</> have an obvious advantage.
20050399.Chinese_Text:
单纯比较强度与硬度的话，
<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>牙齿</>具有压倒性优势。

20050400.Original_Text: 그렇게 해서 <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>이빨</>이 으뜸 무기라고 하면...\n저 연세 있으신 상인분이 인정하지 않으시겠죠?
20050400.English_Text:
Even if I claim that <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>teeth</> are better and my logic is perfect...
Will that old merchant admit it?
20050400.Chinese_Text:
但仅凭这一点就说<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>牙齿</>是最强武器的话…
那位老爷子商人应该不会认同吧？

20050402.English_Text:
I don't know.
But the <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Ratmen</> were using weapons of their own design.
20050402.Chinese_Text:
（表示自己也不知道…
说<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>鼠人族</>会另外使用武器）

20050403.English_Text: What? Even with such strong <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>teeth</> and <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>claws</>?
20050403.Chinese_Text: 嗯？哪怕有这么强大的<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>牙齿</>和<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>爪子</>？

20050405.Original_Text: 배가 좀 아프네요. 아까 <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>버섯</>을 먹었는데 그게 문제였을까요?
20050405.English_Text: I seem to have an upset stomach. I ate a <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>mushroom</> just now, so maybe that's why?
20050405.Chinese_Text: 肚子有点痛。可能是刚才吃的<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>蘑菇</>有问题。

20050407.English_Text:
It's a <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>mushroom</> growing on the body of a <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Gnarlox</>.
I happened to just find one on a dead <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Gnarlox</>.
20050407.Chinese_Text:
我吃的是长在<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>蓑衣精</>身体上的<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>蘑菇</>。
我偶然发现了<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>蓑衣精</>的尸体。

20050408.English_Text: The <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>mushroom</> growing on it grabbed my attention.
20050408.Chinese_Text: 当时我一眼就看到了长在尸体上的<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>蘑菇</>。

20050409.Original_Text: 아! 이거다! 이건 맛이 없을 수가 없다!\n이렇게 결론을 내렸습니다.
20050409.English_Text:
Ah! This! This must be delicious!
I came to that conclusion.
20050409.Chinese_Text:
哇！就是这个！这不可能不美味！
这就是我的结论。

20050411.Original_Text: 맛은 약간 쓰더라고요. 근데 저 정도 수준이 되면\n쓴맛을 즐길 수 있게 되지요.
20050411.English_Text:
It was a little bitter. But for that kind of bitterness,
I can certainly learn to enjoy it.
20050411.Chinese_Text:
味道有点苦。但是这种程度的苦味
别有一番滋味。

20050412.English_Text:
If it's a poisonous <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>mushroom</>... 
That <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>mushroom</> needs to be investigated.
20050412.Chinese_Text:
（说如果是毒<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>蘑菇</>…
有必要调查一下这种<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>蘑菇</>）

20050413.English_Text:
No, it's fine.
My stomach will calm down eventually.
20050413.Chinese_Text:
不，没关系。
最多就是肚子痛一下而已。

20050414.English_Text:
Do you know where
this woman has gone to?
20050414.Chinese_Text:
（问原本在这里的人
去了哪里）

20050415.Original_Text: 아. 아까 쓰러져서 의원한테 실려 갔습니다.
20050415.English_Text: Ah, she collapsed and was taken to the healer.
20050415.Chinese_Text: 刚才倒在地上，被抬到了大夫那里。

20050417.Original_Text: 뭔가를 잘못 먹은 것 같은데...\n의원님도 그걸 알아야 치료가 가능하다고...
20050417.English_Text:
She must've eaten something weird.
The healer needs to know what it is before treating her.
20050417.Chinese_Text:
好像吃错了什么…
大夫也说需要知道吃错了什么才能更有效地治疗…

20050418.English_Text:
She ate a <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Gnarlox</> <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>mushroom</>.
Here is the <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>mushroom</>.

20050419.English_Text: Ah! So this was the problem.
20050419.Chinese_Text: 啊！原来是吃了这个蘑菇？

20050420.English_Text: I'll hand it over to the healer.
20050420.Chinese_Text: 让我把蘑菇交给大夫吧。

20050422.Original_Text: 어라! 거기 잠시만요! \n그렇게 혼자 지나가시면 큰일 나요!
20050422.English_Text:
Hey! Wait there! 
If you pass by yourself like that, you're in trouble!
20050422.Chinese_Text:
어라! 거기 잠시만요! 
그렇게 혼자 지나가시면 큰일 나요!

20050424.Original_Text: 저기 저 <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>홍돈족</>, 엄청나게 난폭하다구요. 저도 취재 자료를 다 빼앗겼어요!\n절 만난걸 다행으로 아세요.
20050424.English_Text:
Hey, that <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Hongdon tribe</> is incredibly violent. I also lost all of my coverage!
You're lucky to have met me.
20050424.Chinese_Text:
저기 저 <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>홍돈족</>, 엄청나게 난폭하다구요. 저도 취재 자료를 다 빼앗겼어요!
절 만난걸 다행으로 아세요.

20050426.Original_Text: 네! 저는 이종족 조사 임무를 맡은 <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>신입 명혜단원</>이에요.\n<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>홍돈족</>은 난폭하긴 하지만 말이 통하니까... 취재를 해보려고 했죠.
20050426.English_Text:
Yes! I'm <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Rookie Myunghye</> on a cross-ethnic investigation.
<textColor=[215:94:94:255]> The Hongdon clan</> are violent, but they can communicate... so I tried to cover it.
20050426.Chinese_Text:
네! 저는 이종족 조사 임무를 맡은 <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>신입 명혜단원</>이에요.
<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>홍돈족</>은 난폭하긴 하지만 말이 통하니까... 취재를 해보려고 했죠.

20050427.Original_Text: 처음에는 취재에 호기심을 보이는 것 같더니,\n하루에 밥을 몇 그릇이나 먹냐는 질문에 갑자기 막 화를 내는 거예요!
20050427.English_Text: At first, he seemed to be curious about the interview, but he suddenly got angry when asked how many bowls of rice a day he eats!
20050427.Chinese_Text:
처음에는 취재에 호기심을 보이는 것 같더니,
하루에 밥을 몇 그릇이나 먹냐는 질문에 갑자기 막 화를 내는 거예요!

20050429.Original_Text: 아무튼, 잠이 들길 기다렸다가 몰래 자료를 되찾아 올 계획이에요.\n소협도 저와 기다렸다가 그때 조용히 지나가세요.
20050429.English_Text:
Anyway, I plan to wait for you to fall asleep and then secretly retrieve the data.
Wait with me too, then quietly pass by.
20050429.Chinese_Text:
아무튼, 잠이 들길 기다렸다가 몰래 자료를 되찾아 올 계획이에요.
소협도 저와 기다렸다가 그때 조용히 지나가세요.

20050430.English_Text: (He said he would find the material)

20050431.Original_Text: 이야... 역시나 멋진 무기네요. 사람들은 잘 모르지만, \n<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>홍돈족</>은 총포 제작 기술까지 보유한 훌륭한 종족이에요.
20050431.English_Text:
Hey... that's a cool weapon. People don't know about it, but the 
<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Hongdon</> are a great race with gunsmithing skills as well.
20050431.Chinese_Text:
이야... 역시나 멋진 무기네요. 사람들은 잘 모르지만, 
<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>홍돈족</>은 총포 제작 기술까지 보유한 훌륭한 종족이에요.

20050432.Original_Text: <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>바롱족</>, <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>수와족</>을 제외한 대부분의 이종족이 이지를 잃어버린 지금, \n<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>홍돈족</>과의 교류는 서로에게 꼭 필요한 일이 될거란 말이죠!
20050432.English_Text:
Most heterogeneous except <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Barong</>, <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Suwa</> Now that we have lost our wisdom, 
<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Exchange with the Hongdon clan</> will be a must for each other!
20050432.Chinese_Text:
<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>바롱족</>, <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>수와족</>을 제외한 대부분의 이종족이 이지를 잃어버린 지금, 
<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>홍돈족</>과의 교류는 서로에게 꼭 필요한 일이 될거란 말이죠!

20050433.Original_Text: 역시 이대로 포기할 순 없어요.\n<textColor=[110:216:175:255]>붉은 숲길</>에 있는 <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>홍돈족</>과도 만나봐야겠어요. 함께 가 주실래요?
20050433.English_Text:
I can't just give up like this.
<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Hongdon on <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>Red Forest Road</> >I want to meet you too. Would you like to go with me?
20050433.Chinese_Text:
역시 이대로 포기할 순 없어요.
<textColor=[110:216:175:255]>붉은 숲길</>에 있는 <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>홍돈족</>과도 만나봐야겠어요. 함께 가 주실래요?

20050435.Original_Text: 거기 여자 인간! 왜 자꾸 찾아오는 거셔?\n오라는 <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>수양</> 놈들은 왜 코빼기도 안 비추는 거셔?
20050435.English_Text:
There's a female human! Why do you keep coming back?
Aura <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Weeping</> why don't they even light their noses?
20050435.Chinese_Text:
거기 여자 인간! 왜 자꾸 찾아오는 거셔?
오라는 <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>수양</> 놈들은 왜 코빼기도 안 비추는 거셔?

20050436.English_Text: Eh... me? Am I the first to come?

20050437.Original_Text: 쿠잉? 인간들은 똑같이 생겨서 헷갈리셔. \n인간, 우리는 <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>수양</>이 약속을 지키지 않는 이상 화해를 할 생각이 없으셔!
20050437.English_Text:
Kooing? Humans are alike and confused. 
Humans, we have no intention of reconciling unless we keep this promise <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Foster</> !
20050437.Chinese_Text:
쿠잉? 인간들은 똑같이 생겨서 헷갈리셔. 
인간, 우리는 <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>수양</>이 약속을 지키지 않는 이상 화해를 할 생각이 없으셔!

20050439.Original_Text: 으이익! 나는 인내심이 엄청 강하셔. 마지막으로 한번만 더 말해주겠셔.\n그러니 귓구멍 열고 똑똑히 들으셔!!!!!
20050439.English_Text:
Wow! I'm very patient. I'll tell you one last time.
So open your ears and listen carefully!!!!!
20050439.Chinese_Text:
으이익! 나는 인내심이 엄청 강하셔. 마지막으로 한번만 더 말해주겠셔.
그러니 귓구멍 열고 똑똑히 들으셔!!!!!

20050440.Original_Text: <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>수양</>은 우리가 <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>해월대륙</> 개척을 도우면 정착할 땅과 돈을 주기로 약속했셔.\n우리는 최선을 다해 인간을 도왔셔. 하지만!!!!!!
20050440.English_Text:
<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Weeping</> is the land we will settle if we help clear <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>Sea Moon Continent</> You promised to give me money.
We did our best to help humans. But!!!!!!
20050440.Chinese_Text:
<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>수양</>은 우리가 <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>해월대륙</> 개척을 도우면 정착할 땅과 돈을 주기로 약속했셔.
우리는 최선을 다해 인간을 도왔셔. 하지만!!!!!!

20050441.Original_Text: 하지만 <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>수양</>은 우리에게 대가를 지불하지 않았셔!\n매번 비겁한 변명만 하고 있으셔.
20050441.English_Text:
But <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Weeping</> didn't pay us anything!
You're always making cowardly excuses.
20050441.Chinese_Text:
하지만 <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>수양</>은 우리에게 대가를 지불하지 않았셔!
매번 비겁한 변명만 하고 있으셔.

20050442.Original_Text: 우리도 더 이상 참지 않으셔. \n힘으로 땅을 빼앗을 수밖에 없으셔!!
20050442.English_Text:
We can't stand it any longer. 
We have no choice but to take the land by force!!
20050442.Chinese_Text:
우리도 더 이상 참지 않으셔. 
힘으로 땅을 빼앗을 수밖에 없으셔!!

20050443.English_Text: Something like that... I didn't even know that...

20050444.Original_Text: 생각만 해도 위가 아프셔. 이러니 내가 체중 감량을 못하는 거셔!!!!\n인간, 이제 알았으면 가서 똑똑히 전하셔.
20050444.English_Text:
My stomach hurts just thinking about it. That's why I can't lose weight!!!!
Human, if you know now, go ahead and tell me.
20050444.Chinese_Text:
생각만 해도 위가 아프셔. 이러니 내가 체중 감량을 못하는 거셔!!!!
인간, 이제 알았으면 가서 똑똑히 전하셔.

20050445.English_Text: Okay! I'm sure I'll tell you!

20050446.Original_Text: 확실히 <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>홍돈족</>이 화가 날만하네요.\n<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>수양</>은 대체 무슨 연유로 <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>홍돈족</>을 이용하고 버린 걸까요?
20050446.English_Text:
Obviously the <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Red Donkey</> is just annoying.
